column2: Amtrak News Release: Amtrak Enhances Share Fares Deal Offering Discount for Up to Six Travelers
column3: The following release, also attached, is issued by Amtrak Media Relations. It is also posted on the Amtrak Media Center<https://media.amtrak.com/2019/08/amtrak-enhances-share-fares-deal-offering-discount-for-up-to-six-travelers/> at Media.Amtrak.com<http://www.media.amtrak.com./>. --  Amtrak Enhances Share Fares Deal Offering Discount for Up to Six Travelers Get carried away and share the experience with up to 45% off travel  WASHINGTON - Amtrak announced its new and improved Share Fares<https://www.amtrak.com/sharefares> deal, offering up to 45% off Amtrak travel. Inspiring customers to travel together with friends and loved ones, Amtrak now offers discounts for up to six passengers as part of its Share Fares deal. The deal was previously available for four passengers and provided up to a 35% discount.  The Share Fares discount is valid for purchase on August 12 for travel after August 14 and requires a reservation two days in advance. The more the merrier on Amtrak with customers saving up to 45% on tickets when traveling with up to six companions.  "Recognizing the desire to get more out of every experience, we've given our customers the opportunity to travel together and save," said Amtrak President and CEO Richard Anderson. "Now with the ability to bring even more friends and loved ones along, customers can share both the ride, and savings while skipping traffic, tolls and parking."  Share Fares is valid for travel on the Amtrak Northeast Regional and on the national network on some of the most popular trains, including the California Zephyr, Capitol Limited, City of New Orleans, Cardinal, Empire Builder, Southwest Chief, Texas Eagle, Coast Starlight, Lake Shore Limited, Palmetto, Silver Star, Silver Meteor, Auto Train and Crescent. Discount is not valid on Acela.  Share Fares is available with promo code V291. The fare structure:    *   Customer one - full price   *   Customer two - 15%   *   Customer three - 60%   *   Customer four - 70%   *   Customer five - 70%   *   Customer six - 70% The offer is available for up to six customers traveling together on the same itinerary and is available at Amtrak.com. Reservations are required a minimum of two days prior to travel. This offer is not valid on the 7000-8999 Thruways. The companion and full fare passenger must travel together on the same itinerary and have tickets issues together. This offer is valid for coach seats only; no upgrades allowed. This offer is not combinable with any other discount offer. Sale prices are not available at all times and on all routes. This offer is also subject to any restrictions, blackouts and refund rules that apply to the type of fare purchased, a 25 percent cancellation fee may apply.   About Amtrak(r)  Amtrak offers a more comfortable and convenient travel experience with free Wi-Fi on most trains, plenty of leg room and no middle seat. With our state and commuter partners, we move people, the economy and the nation forward, carrying more than 30 million Amtrak customers for each of the past seven years. Amtrak operates more than 300 trains daily, connecting more than 500 destinations in 46 states, the District of Columbia and three Canadian Provinces, and reaches 400 additional destinations via connecting bus routes. Book travel, check train status, access your eTicket and more through an Amtrak app.<https://www.amtrak.com/get-mobile-application-and-access> Learn more at Amtrak.com<http://www.amtrak.com/>.   ###

column2: Support success for early childhood education in Boston
column3: Hi there, Elementary schools, churches, community centers, and many other institutions benefiting the public are strengthened from students who've earned a major in early childhood education. Their roles as teachers, social workers, and counselors provide immeasurable support to their neighbors and communities, and efforts made to foster their academic health in turn foster the health of our communities.  In light of this information, ChristianColleges.com has developed an open-use guide to a career in early childhood education. This guide is rich with information that Boston's students need to know to succeed, covering core sections such as courses, job outlook, related organizations, and more. In addition, we've prepared further materials on Christian education exploring Bible schools and vocational education. It's our hope to get this vital information in the hands of students everywhere as quickly as is necessary for their best success.  Christian Education Series Christian College Accreditation Guide - https://www.christiancolleges.com/online-degrees/associates-in-early-childhood-education/  Christian College Fundamentals - https://www.christiancolleges.com/online-degrees/bachelors-in-early-childhood-education/  Bible College Essentials - https://www.christiancolleges.com/online-degrees/best-bible-colleges/  Pastor Study Overview - https://www.christiancolleges.com/careers/how-to-become-a-pastor/  These guides are available to students everywhere, and because they look to local academic and field leaders for examples and resources, we'll need your help to reach them. You can help support Boston's students in their faith and education by posting links to these guides on the Christian Science website. This page would be great for them: https://www.christianscience.com/additional-resources. Your link will make a big impact in our communities. Thank you for sharing these educational resources. Please reach out to us with any questions you may have. Warm regards,  Laura Coleman | LauraC@christiancolleges.com Outreach Coordinator | ChristianColleges.com PO Box 524314 | Houston, TX 77052  ChristianColleges.com is an interdenominational, nonpartisan organization connecting students with Bible and Christian universities that fit their needs through in-depth academic, financial aid, and college life resources. Learn more about us, if you do not want to receive emails from us in the future, please reply to this message with "Remove" in the subject line.

column2: Press release: GNTB says "GO" to Year of German-American friendship in the US
column3: Cooperation in the source market USA» In case of display problems with our newsletter, please click here.[https://wlk-ems.com/crm/service/nlweb?bpid=2104726304mid=2100610529nlid=2377624933language=enchk=h3a6fFRFXF] Dear Kim, What have actor Leonardo DiCaprio, President Dwight D. Eisenhower, and ketchup magnate Henry Heinz in common? They are all of German descent. The German immigrant story is a long one - a tale of early origins, and continuous growth. Today, more than 44 million US citizens have German ancestry. To entice them to follow their roots back to Hamburg, Stuttgart, or Munich, the GNTB has launched a new campaign under the title GO (German Originality), which is part of the Year of German-American friendship, and has been launched in cooperation with the Goethe Institut and the BDI (Federal Association of German Industry). Best, Amrei Gold Head of Public Relations, North America German National Tourist Office 122 East 42nd Street, Suite 2000 New York, NY 10168-0072 Phone +1 212 661 7175 Telefax +1 212 661 7174 amrei.gold@germany.travel[mailto:Amrei.Gold@germany.travel] www.germany.travel[http://wlk-ems.com/crm/service/rdc?rtg=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.germany.travelbpid=2104726304mid=2100610529nlid=2377624933lid=-3chk=mFS369FLAVganame=Press_2019_08_PM_GNTB+says+%22GO%22+to+Year+of+German-American+Friendship+in+the+US] Press Information Cooperation in the source market USA GNTB says "GO" to Year of German-American friendship in the US [http://wlk-ems.com/crm/service/rdc?rtg=https%3A%2F%2Fwunderbartogether.org%2Fbpid=2104726304mid=2100610529nlid=2377624933lid=-3chk=mFS369FLAV] New York, August 8, 2019 - The German National Tourist Board (GNTB) is participating with the "GO" campaign in the 2019 "Year of German-American friendship" ("Deutschlandjahr") in the US. "GO" stands for "German Originality" and builds on the strong historical ties that have developed between the two countries, aiming to inspire Americans to travel to Germany. Some 44 million US citizens have German roots. The "Year of German-American friendship" was initiated in the US by the Federal Foreign Office in cooperation with the Goethe Institut and the BDI (Federal Association of German Industry). At the heart of the Year of Germany are dialogues, exchanges, the cooperation between people and cultures, and the development and expansion of networks. Germany Years demonstrate in which areas Germany and the respective host country can complement each other as partners, and work on the solution of critical future tasks. Under the title "Wunderbar together," the Year of German-American friendship (October 2018 until December 2019) in the US underscores the unique significance of transatlantic relations with a bundle of projects in the areas of economics, politics, education, culture, and science. The campaign is supported through project funding by the Federal Foreign Office and the Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Energy (BMWi). Petra Hedorfer, CEO of the GNTB's board of directors, explains: "With 6.7 million overnight stays, the US is by far the most important overseas source market for incoming German tourism. In our marketing campaign for the Year of German-American friendship, we see an excellent opportunity to give additional impetus to the continuing great interest in Germany as a travel destination." The target group of the "GO" campaign are Americans with German roots in the Heartland of the US, as well as Millennials. Accordingly, the existing microsite "German Originality" under www.germany.travel/heritage was completely revised, user-generated content integrated, and a raffle incorporated. In the first two months, the campaign reached around three million people. Four US influencers explore aspects of their German origins, German-owned companies and brands in the US, and cultural influences of both countries. Their journeys address German immigrants, architectural history, influential Germans in the past, and German customs. The influencers share their content on the GNTB microsite as well as on their own social media channels. Also, the GNTB participates - with a sweepstake on branded IPads - in a pop-up tour of the Goethe-Institut, which is passing through selected cities in the US. With business conferences, science slams, art exhibitions, concerts, interactive activities for students, and panel discussions, the events offer distinct impressions of today's Germany. More than 20,000 attendees were welcomed on the first stop of the pop-up tour during Germany Week in Chicago (April 26 to May 5, 2019). More events will take place in Atlanta (September 24 to 28, 2019), and Portland (October 8 to 12, 2019). About the GNTBThe German National Tourist Board (GNTB) has its headquarters in Frankfurt am Main, Germany. It works on behalf of the Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Energy (BMWi) to represent Germany as a tourist destination and is funded by the Ministry in accordance with a decision taken by the German Bundestag. The GNTB develops and communicates strategies and products to promote Germany's positive image abroad as a tourist destination and to encourage tourists to visit the country. It has 31 agencies around the world to support its activities. More information can be found in our online press centre atwww.germany.travel/press [http://wlk-ems.com/crm/service/rdc?rtg=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.germany.travel%2Fpressbpid=2104726304mid=2100610529nlid=2377624933lid=-3chk=mFS369FLAVganame=Press_2019_08_PM_GNTB+says+%22GO%22+to+Year+of+German-American+Friendship+in+the+US]. This press information has been sent to sentinel@csps.com. This press information is being sent to you with your permission only. Should you no longer wish to receive this press information, please clickhere[https://wlk-ems.com/crm/service/unl?bpid=2104726304mid=2100610529nlid=2377624933chk=h3a6fFRFXFnlt=2082177422]. Privacy Policy[http://wlk-ems.com/crm/service/rdc?rtg=http%3A%2F%2Fgermany.travel%2Fdataprotectionbpid=2104726304mid=2100610529nlid=2377624933lid=-3chk=mFS369FLAVganame=Press_2019_08_PM_GNTB+says+%22GO%22+to+Year+of+German-American+Friendship+in+the+US] Object to data processing[https://wlk-ems.com/crm/service/usy?bpid=2104726304mid=2100610529nlid=2377624933chk=h3a6fFRFXF]

column2: New Team Members
column3: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  Greetings! I hope you're doing well. Our GM Alex has resigned to pursue a new career as a teacher and we want to wish  him the best. With his exit we have hired some new team members that will be starting over the next couple of weeks. In the meantime myself and other existing team members can help you if Alex has been your usual point of contact. Something I do want to address while I have your attention, is we get a lot of emails to place orders or request quotes, which is fine but it does leave a margin for  error, in that I myself will get an email, start to work on putting in the order  or send back a quote, get a call, get pulled away from my desk or any other number of reasons that my attention gets divided, resulting in the action not being completed and leaving your request unaddressed. If you do not get a response or get an order confirmation for an email you sent,  please follow up with us to ensure we do fulfill your request.  This is by no means an attempt to push you to our website to place an order if you are not comfortable doing so, you're always welcome to call us, come by or email us but the website  has a ton of resources, pricing and full online ordering, in fact all orders through TampaPrinter.com go through our site whether we put them in for you or you put them in on your own. We're very excited about our new team members and are confident that we will continue to provide you with great service (and maybe even better). column2: Yale’s Dr. James Childs Available for Coverage on Ebola Outbreak
column3: Hello Stephanie Hanes,   As you may know, the World Health Organization has declared the Ebola outbreak in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC) an international emergency. Although this deadly virus has yet to reappear in the U.S., it is spreading itself relentlessly throughout the Democratic Republic of the Congo with almost 3,000 cases reported from August 2018 through July 2019.   I wanted to offer Yale University infectious diseases expert James Childs, ScD for your ongoing coverage.   Dr. Childs is media experienced and available to be interviewed from Yale’s fully functioning broadcast center that can feed our experts our with live video or audio interviews or send you a recorded segment. Feel free to respond to this e-mail with interest, or contact Fred Mamoun at (323) 363-1093. Please reach out any time for assistance.   James E. Childs, ScD  [cid:378c270d-6306-4bc9-8b0f-9bdf60c6d85a]  Senior Research Scientist and Lecturer in Epidemiology (Microbial Diseases)  Dr. Childs’ research focuses on zoonotic diseases. He studies viruses and bacteria maintained by rodent reservoir hosts, and the mechanisms by which rodent-borne pathogens are transmitted to humans. Dr. Childs takes interest in understanding the means by which zoonotic agents are transmitted and maintained within natural populations of reservoir-hosts; elucidating the biological means and ecological circumstances leading to cross-species transmission of zoonotic agents and the novel pathogenic processes which can result in novel, life-threatening human disease.    -- Noah Vaca Office of Public Affairs & Communications Yale University 203-683-8181 http://news.yale.edu   --  To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to customerservice+unsubscribe@csps.com.

column2: MIRANDA LAMBERT PLAYS HER WILDCARD, EAGERLY AWAITED NEW ALBUM DUE NOV. 1 DEBUTS NEW SONG “BLUEBIRD” TODAY
column3: View this email in your browser (https://mailchi.mp/59edb6d28af1/miranda-lambert-plays-her-wildcard-eagerly-awaited-new-album-due-nov-1-debuts-new-song-bluebird-today?e=1acc59e421) FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE August 15, 2019 MIRANDA LAMBERT PLAYS HER WILDCARD EAGERLY AWAITED NEW ALBUM DUE NOV. 1 DEBUTS NEW SONG “BLUEBIRD” TODAY https://truepublicrelations.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=12625cf9000644aef0f718377&id=897a2304f9&e=1acc59e421 (Photo Credit: Ellen von Unwerth) Download JPEG (https://truepublicrelations.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=12625cf9000644aef0f718377&id=b754c7a6d7&e=1acc59e421) NASHVILLE, Tenn. – Miranda Lambert’s hotly anticipated seventh studio album Wildcard will arrive Nov. 1 on Vanner Records/RCA Records Nashville.  “When people listen to this record, I want them to know that I see them and hear them,” said Lambert. “I feel you, because I’m just a girl from East Texas, writing about all the things that go on in my world and in the worlds of people around me. I want people to get along, you know, just be who you are, own it and move on from the moments you couldn’t live in.”  Her first collaboration with producer Jay Joyce, Wildcard moves from fraught, taut rock & roll to gentle folk, classic Wurlitzer country and a bit of funky gospel with Lambert’s signature wit and tongue-in-cheek humor permeating throughout.  The Grammy Award winner celebrated today’s announcement by releasing the latest peek inside the project – “Bluebird,” which she co-wrote with Luke Dick and Natalie Hemby. The album also features “infectious” (Billboard), Top 25 lead single “It All Comes Out in the Wash,” as well as recently-released “foot-stompin’ barnburner” (NPR) “Locomotive” and “crunchy, frisky jam” (Stereogum) “Mess with My Head.” Additional album details will be revealed soon.  Listeners can pre-order Wildcard and pre-add the album to their collections now (https://truepublicrelations.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=12625cf9000644aef0f718377&id=8c6aaaa4ca&e=1acc59e421) . “It All Comes Out in the Wash,” “Locomotive,” “Mess with My Head,” and “Bluebird” are also available on all streaming platforms and digital retailers (https://truepublicrelations.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=12625cf9000644aef0f718377&id=451fd5f09d&e=1acc59e421) .  To welcome the new artistic chapter, Lambert will hit the road for the Roadside Bars & Pink Guitars Tour this fall, with special guests Maren Morris and Elle King, as well as Pistol Annies, Tenille Townes, Ashley McBryde and Caylee Hammack on various dates (details below). Tickets are on sale now.  Upcoming Tour Dates: Fairs & Festivals: Friday, August 16 – Country Thunder Alberta || Calgary, Alberta Friday, August 30 – The Great Allentown Fair || Allentown, Penn. Saturday, August 31 – Borgata Hotel Casino & Spa || Atlantic City, N.J.  Featuring Elle King, Pistol Annies and Caylee Hammack: Friday, September 13 – Mohegan Sun Arena || Uncasville, Conn. Saturday, September 14 – Mohegan Sun Arena || Uncasville, Conn. Thursday, September 19 – Van Andel Center || Grand Rapids, Mich. Friday, September 20 – Huntington Center || Toledo, Ohio Saturday, September 21 – BB&T Arena at Northern Kentucky University || Highland Heights, Ky.  Featuring Elle King, Pistol Annies and Tenille Townes: Thursday, September 26 – Royal Farms Arena || Baltimore, Md. Friday, September 27 – Charleston Coliseum || Charleston, W.Va. Saturday, September 28 – Nationwide Arena || Columbus, Ohio  Featuring Maren Morris, Pistol Annies and Tenille Townes: Thursday, October 3 – Cajundome || Lafayette, La. Friday, October 4 – Smoothie King Center || New Orleans, La. Saturday, October 5 – Centurylink Center || Bossier City, La. Thursday, October 10 – State Farm Center || Champaign, Ill. Friday, October 11 – Pinnacle Bank Arena || Lincoln, Neb. Saturday, October 12 – Denny Sanford Premier Center || Sioux Falls, S.D.  Featuring Elle King, Pistol Annies and Ashley McBryde: Thursday, October 17 – Fargo Dome || Fargo, N.D. Friday, October 18 – Fiserv Forum || Milwaukee, Wisc. Saturday, October 19 – Xcel Energy Center || Saint Paul, Minn. Thursday, October 24 – TaxSlayer Center || Moline, Ill. Friday, October 25 – JQH Arena || Springfield, Mo. Saturday, October 26 – INTRUST Bank Arena || Wichita, Kan.  Featuring Maren Morris, Pistol Annies and Tenille Townes: Thursday, November 7 – John Paul Jones Arena || Charlottesville, Va. Friday, November 8 – Colonial Life Arena || Columbia, S.C. Saturday, November 9 – Amway Center || Orlando, Fla.  Featuring Maren Morris, Pistol Annies and Ashley McBryde: Thursday, November 21 – VyStar Veterans Memorial Arena || Jacksonville, Fla. Friday, November 22 – Infinite Energy Arena || Duluth, Ga. Saturday, November 23 – Greensboro Coliseum || Greensboro, N.C.  About Miranda Lambert: Vanner Records/RCA recording artist Miranda Lambert will release her highly anticipated new studio album Wildcard Nov. 1, which includes her latest country radio single, “It All Comes Out in the Wash.” This fall, Miranda will embark on her rotating, all-girl “Roadside Bars and Pink Guitars” tour featuring Maren Morris, Elle King, Ashley McBryde, Tenille Townes, Caylee Hammack, and the Pistol Annies. This follows two extensive tours in 2018, “Living Like Hippies” in the winter/spring and “The Bandwagon” summer tour with Little Big Town.  The most decorated artist in the history of the Academy of Country Music, Lambert is the recipient of more than 70 prestigious awards and special honors: 32 ACM Awards (including 9 ACM Female Vocalist of the Year Awards), 13 CMA Awards (Country Music Association), 2 GRAMMY Awards, the Harmony Award (Nashville Symphony), Artist in Residence (Country Music Hall of Fame), the ACM Gene Weed Milestone Award, and several others.  The celebrated singer/songwriter has released six studio albums that all debuted at No. 1 on the Billboard Top Country Album Charts, including the critically acclaimed double record The Weight of These Wings (2016), Platinum (2014), Four The Record (2011), Revolution (2009), Crazy Ex-Girlfriend (2007) and Kerosene (2005). In addition, she released three albums with her trio, the Pistol Annies.  Her clothing and cowboy boot collection, Idyllwind, is a private-label brand sold at all Boot Barn stores nationwide. www.idyllwind.com  MirandaLambert.com (https://truepublicrelations.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=12625cf9000644aef0f718377&id=ff1c613a87&e=1acc59e421) | Facebook (https://truepublicrelations.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=12625cf9000644aef0f718377&id=8814575fbd&e=1acc59e421) | Twitter (https://truepublicrelations.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=12625cf9000644aef0f718377&id=e6735eba26&e=1acc59e421) | Instagram (https://truepublicrelations.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=12625cf9000644aef0f718377&id=06dc908394&e=1acc59e421) | YouTube (https://truepublicrelations.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=12625cf9000644aef0f718377&id=caac633cf9&e=1acc59e421)  Media Contacts: Allen Brown, Courtney Beebe Sony Music Nashville Allen.brown@sonymusic.com (mailto:Allen.brown@sonymusic.com) / Courtney.beebe@sonymusic.com (mailto:Courtney.beebe@sonymusic.com)  Marcel Pariseau TRUE Public Relations marcel@truepublicrelations.com (mailto:marcel@truepublicrelations.com)  ============================================================ Copyright © 2019 True Public Relations, All rights reserved. column2: What Happened to Our Shared Dream?
column3: This is your last chance to sponsor the upcoming book...  View this email in your browser (https://mailchi.mp/caapusa/bill-owens-of-caap-215465?e=f4925dc692) https://secure.anedot.com/coalition-of-african-american-pastors-usa/dream-derailed-sponsors?mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID] http://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fmailchi.mp%2Fcaapusa%2Fbill-owens-of-caap-215465&mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID] Share (http://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fmailchi.mp%2Fcaapusa%2Fbill-owens-of-caap-215465&mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID]) http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=What+Happened+to+Our+Shared+Dream%3F:&mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID] https%3A%2F%2Fmailchi.mp%2Fcaapusa%2Fbill-owens-of-caap-215465 Tweet (http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=What+Happened+to+Our+Shared+Dream%3F:&mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID] https%3A%2F%2Fmailchi.mp%2Fcaapusa%2Fbill-owens-of-caap-215465) http://us6.forward-to-friend.com/forward?u=92112f469785e1152be1993c1&id=caaf49c4fa&e=f4925dc692 Forward to a Friend (http://us6.forward-to-friend.com/forward?u=92112f469785e1152be1993c1&id=caaf49c4fa&e=f4925dc692)   ** What Happened to Our Shared Dream? ------------------------------------------------------------ Dear Partner,  When I sat down to work on my book, A Dream Derailed (http://adreamderailed.com/?mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID]) , I knew the topic was timely, but I didn't realize that I was about to be dragged into the race issue that has overtaken American politics.  As I explain in the book, the dream of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. and the civil rights pioneers has been thwarted. Black America has not reached the "Promised Land." Instead, we have been led astray by failed policies and opportunistic politicians.  Some people can only see the results, not the causes. Thus, we have seen the development of a kind of racialist politics, where the charge of racism is used as both a weapon against every political opponent and a shield against all criticism. This was the thinking behind Don Lemon's attack on me when I refused to call President Trump a racist.  It's also the kind of thinking that I'm trying to correct in A Dream Derailed (http://adreamderailed.com/?mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID]) .  A Dream Derailed (http://adreamderailed.com/?mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID])  combines memoir and history with a call to action for all Americans. In it, I suggest that we leave behind the concept of racism, as it holds us back from achieving God's plan.  We're in the final edits of the book now and getting ready for printing. After that, we'll be distributing the book and embarking on a tour to promote A Dream Derailed and the prescriptions in it.  Of course, this is a very exciting time for us. I've had lots of inquiries about where to get the book, whether it will be available in large quantities, on Amazon, and so on.  I promise you that we are doing everything we can to make it as widely available as possible.  Because we are so close to publication, this is your last chance to  become a sponsor (https://secure.anedot.com/coalition-of-african-american-pastors-usa/dream-derailed-sponsors?mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID])  of A Dream Derailed. We're very close to our goal for publication and distribution of the book - just a few more sponsors will put us over the top.  Don't miss this chance to become a sponsor - all it takes is $100.  Everyone who gives $100 or more will be given a signed copy of A Dream Derailed and will be listed on our Sponsors page. (https://secure.anedot.com/coalition-of-african-american-pastors-usa/dream-derailed-sponsors?mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID])  If you can't become a sponsor, you can still help us reach our goal by giving your best gift today (https://secure.anedot.com/coalition-of-african-american-pastors-usa/dream-derailed-sponsors?mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID]) . A donation of $30 will include a copy of the book as our thank you.  To donate, simply click our secure link and send your gift via credit card or e-check (https://secure.anedot.com/coalition-of-african-american-pastors-usa/dream-derailed-sponsors?mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID]) .  You're probably wondering whether we'll be coming to a city near you once we start the Dream Derailed book tour. At the moment, the tour is still in the planning stages, but I will be sending out more details as it gets closer. In the meantime, please help us reach our goal by sponsoring this book (https://secure.anedot.com/coalition-of-african-american-pastors-usa/dream-derailed-sponsors?mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID]) . With your aid, we'll be able to get this message to the people who need to hear it most!  For faith, family and freedom, Rev. Bill Owens and Dr. Deborah Owens  P.S. Your prayers and financial support will help us put this country on the right path. Please help us as we strengthen our grassroots network and work to educate and inspire pastors, community leaders, and politicians to defend our Christian rights. Donate to CAAP today!  (https://causes.anedot.com/caap-email-appeal?mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID])  The Coalition of African American Pastors, [aka] The Coalition for American Action and Principles, is a grass roots movement of Christians who believe in traditional family values in American public life.  We believe in protecting the lives of the unborn, and defending the sacred institution of marriage. CAAP does not endorse, support, or oppose any candidate for political office. Any mention of public figures herein is purely for discussion and educational purposes and should not be interpreted as a statement of electoral support or opposition.  *The Coalition of African American Pastors is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization.  Your donations to The Coalition of African American Pastors may be tax deductible to the fullest extent of the law.  No goods or services were received in exchange for any contributions.  You should consult a tax advisor regarding any tax deductions.  CAAP does not endorse any politician or political campaign. Make a Donation to CAAP! (https://causes.anedot.com/caap-email-appeal?mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID]) http://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fmailchi.mp%2Fcaapusa%2Fbill-owens-of-caap-215465&mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID] Share (http://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fmailchi.mp%2Fcaapusa%2Fbill-owens-of-caap-215465&mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID]) http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=What+Happened+to+Our+Shared+Dream%3F:&mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID] https%3A%2F%2Fmailchi.mp%2Fcaapusa%2Fbill-owens-of-caap-215465 Tweet (http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=What+Happened+to+Our+Shared+Dream%3F:&mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID] https%3A%2F%2Fmailchi.mp%2Fcaapusa%2Fbill-owens-of-caap-215465) http://us6.forward-to-friend.com/forward?u=92112f469785e1152be1993c1&id=caaf49c4fa&e=f4925dc692 Forward to a Friend (http://us6.forward-to-friend.com/forward?u=92112f469785e1152be1993c1&id=caaf49c4fa&e=f4925dc692) http://caapusa.org/membership/rise/?mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID] Rise is CAAP's exclusive grassroots network, uniting people of every race, creed, culture, and background. You donâ€™t need to be a Pastor. You donâ€™t need to be African American. All you need in order to join RISE is a desire to help us create a new movement for faith, family, and justice. Join RISE! (http://caapusa.org/membership/rise/?mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID]) http://caapusa.org/membership/caap-clergy-membership/?mc_cid=caaf49c4fa&mc_eid=[UNIQID] Men and women of faith working together to promote and protect the values we hold dear. We welcome clergy (bishops, pastors, ministers, evangelists, every member of the clergy) from any race to join our movement to protect and defend faith and family! column2: PSALM SPACE - PEG LUKE’S EXTRAORDINARY WORK NOW AVAILABLE
column3: To view this email online, paste this link into your browser: https://t.e2ma.net/message/nyd42b/fs3plh       (https://t.e2ma.net/click/nyd42b/fs3plh/f0p0ii)    For more information or to schedule an interview with Peg Luke, please contact Cindy Dupree of PLA Media at (615) 327-0100 or cindy.dupree@plamedia.com (mailto:cindy.dupree@plamedia.com).     For more information about New Day Christian Distribution, contact Nicole Gregory  at ngregory@daywind.com (mailto:ngregory@daywind.com).      Listen to the Psalm Space by clicking here (https://t.e2ma.net/click/nyd42b/fs3plh/vsq0ii).   View the videos here (https://t.e2ma.net/click/nyd42b/fs3plh/blr0ii).  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE  CONTACT: Cindy Dupree  PHONE: (615) 327-0100  EMAIL: cindy.dupree@plamedia.com (mailto:cindy.dupree@plamedia.com)  PEG LUKE’S EXTRAORDINARY WORK “PSALM SPACE”   NOW AVAILABLE  “Holy Music with Healing Properties”  “Psalm Space,” the musical creation written by Peg Luke, composer and world-renowned flutist, is now available on Spotify, Pandora, Apple Music, as well as in many brick and mortar outlets nation-wide. “Psalm Space” interprets six popular Biblical Psalms, as well as new versions of “The Lord’s Prayer,” “Kum Bah Yah,” and more. Among other achievements, Peg Luke has performed 12 sold-out Carnegie Hall flute recitals.  The deeply spiritual music of “Psalm Space” was created to bring soul-nourishment to the masses. Purposely written using the French Taize technique, the sound creates a calming effect and gives listeners a chance to meditate, heal, emote kindness and peace. The work is meant to inspire relaxation and restoration, whether driving home from a hectic day at work or suffering a tragic loss.   “Psalm Space exists to bring hope and healing to people who need encouragement. Throughout the entire process, I quickly became aware of the power of this music to touch and help people,” Luke says. “It’s my gift to the world, and I am very grateful for all the people that made this vision a reality.”  “Psalm Space” was produced by multi-Grammy Award-winner, Neal Merrick Blackwood, is fully orchestrated and features popular soloists Lisa Bevill and Terry Blackwood. Adult and children’s choirs are highlights of the rich musical interpretations.    Each of the ten songs featured on “Psalm Space” have been visually interpreted and are available on Peg Luke’s You Tube channel here: PegLuke'sYouTube (https://t.e2ma.net/click/nyd42b/fs3plh/rds0ii)  This release comes on the heels of Peg Luke signing a distribution deal with industry leader New Day Christian Distributors.   “We are absolutely thrilled that our team at New Day Christian Distribution gets to help take the beautiful musical project “Psalm Space,” by internationally-known flutist Peg Luke to the retail market, said Dusty Wells, director of sales, New Day. “This gorgeous project resonates beauty and peace when listening to it - one of those rare projects that you can start playing and let it repeat over and over. ‘Psalm Space’ contains simple and beautiful music to soothe the soul.”  For more information visit: PsalmSpace (https://t.e2ma.net/click/nyd42b/fs3plh/75s0ii) or NewDayDistribution (https://t.e2ma.net/click/nyd42b/fs3plh/nyt0ii).   # # #  About Peg Luke  Peg Luke began learning piano at the age of five and flute at the age of seven. She has certainly carved out her own original journey, utilizing not only her flute skills, but her piano and compositional skills as well. Luke attended Northern Illinois University, where she quickly won the coveted Concerto Competition during her sophomore year. While doing her Doctoral studies at the University of Minnesota, British flautist Geoffrey Gilbert sensed her innate connecction to the instrument and advised her to "go out and just play the flute."  Peg Luke has done just that, performing at Carnegie Hall (12 solo flute recitals), Cadogan Hall, the National Flute Convention, and many more. Peg and her husband Jack spent more than a year in Nashville to pursue her dream project "Psalm Space." Not only is this project composed by Peg and inspired by her favorite Psalms, she is also a featured performer on "Psalm Space." Luke has been working with multi-Grammy Award-winning producer, Neal Merrick Blackwood on "Psalm Space."       1303 16th Ave. S. | Nashville, TN 37212 US  This email was sent to sentinel@csps.com. To ensure that you continue receiving our emails, please add us to your address book or safe list.  manage your preferences (https://app.e2ma.net/app2/audience/signup/1581/1565/442477085/?s=cybUwDQpqXpwxnh9blHQFvQFUS8sn2r6RUYIoDNu7D4) opt out (https://t.e2ma.net/optout/nyd42b/fs3plh?s=IsNCXcE7SBe0ta4mNtgN94DlodS37vNC7oiydYok4zM&r=aHR0cHM6Ly9hcHAuZTJtYS5uZXQvYXBwMi9hdWRpZW5jZS9vcHRfb3V0LzE1ODEvMTU2NS80NDI0NzcwODUvP3M9YjZHSmlkMlR3ODhZbWZaZEtJbk43b3dacEdFbFkxVDM1ZzY0VEIwejduZw%3D%3D) using TrueRemove(r).  Got this as a forward? Sign up (https://app.e2ma.net/app2/audience/signup/1581/1565.108899869/) to receive our future emails.

column2: New Study: Massachusetts No. 13 Best State for Journalists to Live and Work
column3: Stephanie-- A new study<https://www.safehome.org/resources/best-worst-journalist-states/> released today found Massachusetts is the No. 13 best state for journalists to live and work. Despite being the only industry outside of government mentioned in the Bill of Rights, the free press has been under fire in recent years including loss of jobs, decreasing print circulation and increasing anti-media sentiment. SafeHome.org<http://www.safehome.org> today released a study on The Best Places for Journalists to Live and Work <https://www.safehome.org/resources/best-worst-journalist-states/> using the latest data from the U.S. Department of Labor, Zillow and U.S. Free Press Tracker. The rankings were determined by factoring in the latest statistics and trends in employment opportunities, median salary, cost of a living and safety concerns including attacks on media members. Below are Massachusetts findings from the study:  •       Journalist Employment per 1,000 Jobs: .29%  •       Projected Change in Employment by 2026: -9.6%  •       Percentage of Journalist Attacks in Last Three Years: 1%  •       Annual Median Wage: $44,060  •       Median Monthly Rent: $2,485 Below are national findings from the study:  •       26 journalists have been physically attacked in 2019  •       5 best states for journalists are Oklahoma, Kentucky, Nebraska, New Mexico, and Delaware  •       5 worst states for journalists are Oregon, Maryland, Tennessee, Alabama, and Iowa  •       5 best cities for journalists are D.C., New York, Kansas City, Minneapolis and Louisville.  •       5 worst cities for journalists are: San Jose, Nashville, Riverside, Baltimore and Buffalo. Please let us know if you have any questions or need more information. Thanks, Taylor Anne  --  To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to customerservice+unsubscribe@csps.com.

column2: Billboard About Prophet Ibrahim & Kaaba Greets Chicago Riders
column3: The GainPeace Billboard team has launched a new billboard coinciding with the Hajj season to invite highway riders to learn more about the life of the Prophet Ibrahim and Islam. Take a look!  HIGHWAY BILLBOARD ABOUT THE KAABA CONNECTING HUMANITY WITH TAUHEED BY INVITING CHICAGOANS TO LEARN ABOUT PROPHET IBRAHIM Alhamdulillah, the GainPeace Billboard team has launched a new billboard coinciding with the Hajj season to highlight the noble life, example and lessons from the life of Prophet Ibrahim, peace be upon him. The billboard also invites the highway riders to learn more about the life of the Prophet Ibrahim and Islam. WHERE: Chicago highway 294 going north, before O'Hare Oasis WHEN: Aug 12 to Sept 15, 2019 COST: $5500 FREE QURAN AND BROCHURE The billboard contains GainPeace's phone number:1-800-662-ISLAM Callers can ask any question about Islam Callers can request a free translation of the Quran, Callers also receive in their info package two free books, a set of brochures on various topic and a special brochure on the life and lesson from the noble Prophet Ibrahim, peace be upon him Alhamdulillah, GainPeace has received about 50,000 calls over the last 10 years, and half of those caller request GainPeace to send them free literature to read more about Islam. BILLBOARD VIDEO DONATE FOR THE BILLBOARD The cost of the billboard is $5500. The price includes one month of displaying the message and the cost of the production (printing, pasting etc.) The billboard is supposed to be viewed by around 700,000 riders a month. GainPeace requests you to sponsor this billboard for a month or a few days. YES, I WANT TO SPONSOR THE BILLBOARD One months sponsorship - $5500; 15 days - $2750; $1000, $500, $100, ANY AMOUNT Please support the ongoing outreach projects of GainPeace MAIL THE CHECK TO GainPeace 1 South 270 Summit Ave Suite #100 Oakbrook Terrace, IL 60181 Donate Online Quick Pay to: Quickpay@GainPeace.com Zakat Eligible | Tax Deductable TAX ID - 47-3342673 About GainPeace GainPeace is an outreach project of the Islamic Circle of North America, whose goal is to share the authentic message of Islam with humanity. column2: New Career Opportunity in the Trial Court - August 15, 2019
column3: NEW CAREER OPPORTUNITIES OUR MISSION The Trial Court is committed to providing equal access to justice for all who use the Commonwealth’s courts; to the efficient and effective administration of justice and the fair and impartial resolution of disputes; to the protection of constitutional and statutory rights and liberties; to prompt and courteous service to the public by committed and dedicated professional employees utilizing best practices in a manner that inspires public trust and confidence. JOIN OUR TEAM Thank you for your interest in the Massachusetts Trial Court and Appeals Court . Please share the following Massachusetts Trial Court career opportunities with your organization. column2: Support Boston's Christian counseling students
column3: Hi there, Colleges, churches, therapy centers, and many other institutions benefiting the public are strengthened from students who've earned a major in Christian counseling. Their roles as professors, social workers, and counselors provide immeasurable support to their neighbors and communities, and efforts made to foster their academic health in turn foster the health of our communities.  In light of this information, ChristianColleges.com has developed an open-use guide to a career in Christian counseling. This guide is rich with information that Boston's students need to know to succeed, covering core sections such as courses, job outlook, related organizations, and more. In addition, we've prepared further materials on Christian education exploring Bible schools and vocational education. It's our hope to get this vital information in the hands of students everywhere as quickly as is necessary for their best success.  Christian Education Series Christian College Accreditation Guide - https://www.christiancolleges.com/online-degrees/bachelors-in-christian-counseling/  Christian College Fundamentals - https://www.christiancolleges.com/online-degrees/masters-in-christian-counseling/  Bible College Essentials - https://www.christiancolleges.com/online-degrees/best-bible-colleges/  Pastor Study Overview - https://www.christiancolleges.com/careers/how-to-become-a-pastor/  These guides are available to students everywhere, and because they look to local academic and field leaders for examples and resources, we'll need your help to reach them. You can help support Boston's students in their faith and education by posting links to these guides on the Christian Science website. This page would be great for them: https://www.christianscience.com/additional-resources. Your link will make a big impact in our communities. Thank you for sharing these educational resources. Please reach out to us with any questions you may have. Warm regards,  Natalie Baker | Natalie@christiancolleges.com Outreach Coordinator | ChristianColleges.com PO Box 524314 | Houston, TX 77052  ChristianColleges.com is an interdenominational, nonpartisan organization connecting students with Bible and Christian universities that fit their needs through in-depth academic, financial aid, and college life resources. Learn more about us, if you do not want to receive emails from us in the future, please reply to this message with "Remove" in the subject line.

column2: Preparing Students for Mission Trips
column3: Short-term mission trips can be powerful experiences for young people who want to serve the Lord. For students serving with Thirst Missions, our goal is to provide them with a positive, faith-filled experience.  Preparation is key! Each participant receives a manual that provides everything they need to know about their trip, including a packing list, cultural information, and safety and security guidelines, as well as ideas about sharing the gospel and their personal testimony.  Let us help you plan a trip that will allow your students to grow in their faith and experience a life-changing mission trip.  Contact Us  "The phrase I keep hearing from students is 'I want to go back!' The experiences had and relationships formed were powerful and made a lasting impact on our kids."  Jenelle, Parkway Christian School and Belize mission trip participant  Alaska, Belize, Puerto Rico or the Texas Gulf Coast  Unsubscribe  Thirst Missions 21450 Forest Blvd N Suite 200 Forest Lake , Minnesota 55025 United States 1 (651) 464-2212   -- To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to dailylift+unsubscribe@csps.com.

column2: Here's how to make your Back to School Instagrammable

column2: Christian Science Monitor Article Update - Pass the tofu: How eating vegan became a billion-dollar business - Compare The Market Research Artilce
column3: Hi Christian Science Monitor,  I hope this finds you well.  I am reaching out to you on behalf of Compare The Market as I recently came across one of your site's article - Pass the tofu: How eating vegan became a billion-dollar business<https://www.csmonitor.com/World/Americas/2019/0329/Pass-the-tofu-How-eating-vegan-became-a-billion-dollar-business> - that mentions some of the recent research by Compare The Market into British veganism.  May I ask, would be possible to include a reference where the research is mentioned about half way down the page as an additional resource for any of your readers looking to find out more information on the 3.5 million British Vegans and the research that was conducted? The paragraph is underneath "Booming plant business" and is included in the below copy: "One British survey this summer counted 3.5 million British vegans, or 7 percent of the population, up from half a million people in 2016 (although many claim that increase must be exaggerated, reflecting respondents' aspirations more than what is on their plates)."  If it would be possible to include a link back to the research, the Compare The Market webpage is here - https://www.comparethemarket.com/car-insurance/content/cars-against-humanity/  Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing from you.  Kind Regards,  Jack Higgins  Jack Higgins Account Executive 3rd Floor, Victoria House, 1 Leonard Circus, London, EC2A 4DQ<https://www.google.co.uk/maps/place/Tug/@51.5243855,-0.0839785,17z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0xa1cab00a2ad6b398!8m2!3d51.5247241!4d-0.0837252> Work: +44 (0) 20 7033 6938 Email: jack.higgins@tugagency.com<mailto:jack.higgins@tugagency.com> [cid:image004.png@01D00290.0C9482F0]<https://twitter.com/tugagency>[cid:image003.png@01D00290.0C9482F0]<https://www.facebook.com/TugAgency>[cid:image005.png@01D00290.0C9482F0]<http://www.linkedin.com/company/tug>[tug_logo_small]<http://www.tugagency.com/>   ________________________________ This e-mail message and any attached files may contain confidential information solely for its intended recipients. column2: Enter the NRA's Youth Wildlife Art Contest
column3: Calling all students in grades 1 through 12!   Enter the NRA's Youth Wildlife Art Contest <https://www.nramedia.org/t/11080754/52684022/53601/1/> now. Entries must portray any North American game bird or animal that may be legally hunted or trapped. Endangered species and non-game animals are not eligible. First, second and third place winners will be selected for each category and will be awarded $750, $500, and $250. The Best in Show award winner will also receive $1,000. Contest starts September 1, 2019 and ends October 31, 2019. We will be keeping all submitted artwork and will not be returning any submissions.   This year we will be focusing on realism and photo-realistic artwork. Please refer to our website to see examples of previous Winners and Honorable Mention pieces <https://www.nramedia.org/t/11080754/52684022/96206/2/>. Suggested mediums are drawing, pencil, colored pencil, ink, markers, pastels, painting, watercolor, acrylic, or oil paints. Media that will not be accepted are photographs or digital art, including scans of originals.   We look forward to receiving your children's artwork and wish them the best of luck!   For more information, please visit artcontest.nra.org <https://www.nramedia.org/t/11080754/52684022/53601/3/>.   National Rifle Association * 11250 Waples Mill Rd * Fairfax, VA. 22030 Please do not reply to this e-mail. *Unsubscribe from this email list <https://www.nramedia.org/t/11080754/52684022/107/4/?90482085=aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubnJhbWVkaWEub3JnL3U%2faWQ9NTI2ODQwMjIuNDI3NDU5YTlkMGQzYjhkZjQwNTliYWI1M2MxNDhmYjgmbj1UJmw9Y2x1YnNfYXNzb2NpYXRpb25zJm89MTEwODA3NTQ%3d&x=88930042> | Manage your email preferences <https://www.nramedia.org/t/11080754/52684022/52176/7/?f566cc7b=NTI2ODQwMjIuNDI3NDU5YTlkMGQzYjhkZjQwNTliYWI1M2MxNDhmYjg%3d&x=b0885a58> | Contact Us <https://www.nramedia.org/t/11080754/52684022/23127/5/>* Thank you.

column2: Warning - Dogs dying in lakes/ponds, one in GA Lake
column3: America's First Statewide (VA) Animal Cruelty Prosecutor Presenting at APS GA Conference in October  URGENT NEWS! BEWARE: Dogs Dying Due to Toxic Algae in Lakes & Ponds Marietta, Georgia couple shares warning on toxic algae after dog dies less than an hour after visit to Lake Allatoona This was the first time they had taken their border collie, Arya, to the lake. It would be the dog's last. Read More... Here are the latest opportunities to strengthen your faith and connect with the community. A North Carolina woman took her three dogs to a pond to play. Within hours, her pups had died from toxic algae Read More... Blue-green algae: What it is and how to spot it! A pair of news stories this weekend highlighted the dangers. ?Read More... With the heatwave don't forget... Leave your dogs at HOME! ? STATEWIDE (VA) ANIMAL CRUELTY SPECIAL PROSECUTOR PRESENTING AT EXPO Our nation’s first dedicated statewide animal cruelty prosecutor will present at the 2019 Animal Protection Conference and Expo. Virginia State Special Animal Cruelty Prosecutor Michelle Welch is a “game changer” and has set the standard from which all states should follow for the way animals are protected. Meet Michelle Welch,click here Attend, Sponsor or Exhibit at the 21st Annual Animal Protection Conference and Expo TODAY! REGISTER NOW! You don't want to miss this important educational event uniting professionals and advocates together, to end animal cruelty. ? Follow Us ? ? ? ? column2: Tom Steyer Reaches Donor Requirement for September Debate
column3: FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE: Tuesday, August 13, 2019 CONTACT: press@tomsteyer.com Tom Steyer Reaches Donor Requirement for September Debate Just five weeks after announcing his candidacy, Steyer surpasses the DNC donor threshold and is only one qualifying poll away from September debate stage in Houston  (SAN FRANCISCO, August 13, 2019) — Today, candidate for the Democratic presidential nomination Tom Steyer hit the 130,000 individual donor threshold required to reach the Democratic National Committee September debate stage. Steyer met the donor requirement within just five weeks of entering the race, averaging over 26,000 donors a week.  “Since entering the race five weeks ago, our priority has been getting Tom’s message out to the American people,” said Campaign Manager Heather Hargreaves. “Tom reaching this milestone just five weeks into his campaign is proof that his message is resonating with people across the country.”  As the American people learn more about Tom, support for his campaign has rapidly increased, including gaining over 48,800 donors in the last week alone. The campaign has invested in a strong digital program to reach voters, and the strategy is working.  Steyer is now just one qualifying poll away from making it onto the September DNC debate stage in Houston, TX. In only a few weeks, Steyer has surpassed candidates who have been in the race much longer, in polling from Iowa, New Hampshire, Nevada, and South Carolina. Steyer has been steadily gaining traction in early primary states, as indicated by three qualifying polls in Iowa and South Carolina, the most recent of which, from Monmouth University, had the candidate polling at 3%. Other non-DNC sanctioned polls show Steyer joining the top tier of Democratic contenders. Last week, Morning Consult (https://morningconsult.com/2020-democratic-primary/) had Steyer polling at 6% in early states, beating Pete Buttigieg and within striking distance of Kamala Harris. A new Change Research Poll (https://www.changeresearch.com/nevada-poll-august-2-8-2019) has Steyer at 3% in Nevada, besting Beto O’Rourke.  Paid for by Tom Steyer 2020.  ###  About Tom:  Tom Steyer left his successful investing business seven years ago to give his own money and all his time and energy to fighting for progressive causes. He soon became one of the country’s leading forces in registering more young voters and voters of color, fighting climate change, working for racial justice, and helping secure better lives for all Americans. Tom has led a number of people-first, grassroots campaigns that have repeatedly defeated powerful special interests, beating big oil to win clean air laws, forcing big tobacco to pay its share of healthcare costs, and closing a billion-dollar corporate tax loophole to fund public schools.  Tom and his wife Kat Taylor were early signers of the Giving Pledge, a commitment to give the bulk of his fortune to good causes before they die. Tom’s dedication to doing what is right comes from his parents. His father was a lawyer who prosecuted Nazis at the Nuremberg Trials; his mother was a journalist and teacher who volunteered to teach prisoners in New York City jails. Tom says his parents showed him the power of having the courage to do the right thing. Their greatest lesson, he says, was that our actions speak louder than our words – what we do is more important than what we say.  ============================================================ Tom Steyer 2020 | P.O. Box 626 | San Francisco, CA 94104 | USA  Want to change how you receive these emails? You can ** update your preferences (https://tomsteyer.us3.list-manage.com/profile?u=19050e87bef316243d0543d86&id=74b0c16992&e=8cbfa1c52b) or ** unsubscribe from this list (https://tomsteyer.us3.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=19050e87bef316243d0543d86&id=74b0c16992&e=8cbfa1c52b&c=b98463afbe) .  --  To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to customerservice+unsubscribe@csps.com.

column2: RE: NEW Poll: Millennials Lead CBD Use, But the General Public is STILL Confused on What It Actually Is – Experts Available
column3: Hi Stephanie??,  According to a new poll on CBD use (https://u7061146.ct.sendgrid.net/wf/click?upn=G62jSYfZdO-2F12d8lSllQBx8-2FbEVQek3HfcoUcv6EnbsgElKoyAPwuPgHtXsDjcUw7i6EId8fF-2FnN3pM4kUG2mkc1Y2NTH9qmSJe4vguSriA-3D_6pchHAirW10eM8b14ZAlkZkRllITHdt0G4CIxpgEX-2FYMT-2FVtvkhkoxOwXdc140hQDKip1v9w6NG6f4yMNdzd3I0JbBoOspHl9BOjIgd0xs3DCHCWULMMsI0o0nUAnzsqtC7LG2qH0if83TQOduYTxwzheob7DFCy8OcRzVIf2bSBq1w19QcGrmvSHRb4j0fxqzY4K47-2FboB-2FEEbLAcKObyUIQQPwDYR5nhLHYr48qZtW6kl0lfyoFXTenPixRmp6NgK19wrR6VF-2FSsnW5qAy0tbWJ7N6vBH-2BkJCqS7VXTJqHHPnkkSPthUEYwZ8yw5tZW1cM0N2DqIb7xivlQVKBDkb5IN8x5Om2YknCoPoO6Bk-3D , about 1 in 7 American adults use CBD products, with the highest percentage of usage coming from the 18-29 age group.  However, the poll also found that about 35% of those surveyed say they are still unfamiliar and uneducated concerning CBD products.  This information proves that CBD is booming, especially among millennials, however it also shows that a big chunk of adults are unfamiliar with exactly what it is and what it can help with. Which leads to the pressing question: With the explosion of CBD, why are so many people still uneducated?  If interested for a “CBD 101” story and where we currently stand with legislation and FDA progress, I represent CANNOVIA (https://u7061146.ct.sendgrid.net/wf/click?upn=84Em28S1K9SvtzcUtu04EhO2mmcknxIlloRBICyG-2F5s-3D_6pchHAirW10eM8b14ZAlkZkRllITHdt0G4CIxpgEX-2FYMT-2FVtvkhkoxOwXdc140hQDKip1v9w6NG6f4yMNdzd3I0JbBoOspHl9BOjIgd0xs3DCHCWULMMsI0o0nUAnzsqtC7LG2qH0if83TQOduYTxwzheob7DFCy8OcRzVIf2bSBq1w19QcGrmvSHRb4j0fxqzY4K47-2FboB-2FEEbLAcKOb-2FlIKg8z79aYjmYjCnVu4LJpgll64gipS78YA9uF0efi7e2wkuYES2HT6vgtAuEu2qQCzOaaFoezkODoq11R6DUSgyVkKHc9W9z47aAM1QwdgUdA6DBjnFfA0WWiKyZmzi5zGijPvYyrfqsHjD-2F1ogk-3D – a CBD industry leader and can offer the CEO, Brian Baum, along with medical expert, Dr. Pat Hezmall who can comment on the below:  · New poll results: is it surprising millennials are leading the CBD consumption craze? · Why is there so much confusion and misinformation in the CBD industry? Does it have to do with lack of FDA regulation and enforcement? · What is legal and illegal when it comes to CBD? · The importance of quality product and how consumers can ensure they are getting their money’s worth · Potential benefits: what are the potential medical benefits that consumers are seeing with CBD? · More  Please let me know if you’d be interested in covering this new poll or any of the above story bullet ideas.  Thanks!  Tori  About Brian Baum, Cannovia CEO  Brian works across all areas of Cannovia on corporate strategy and development. He leads the business of Cannovia, manages business relationships/partnerships and coordinates the team efforts to capitalize on the CBD opportunity.  Brian brings a background in healthcare, most recently the founder/CEO of vitaTrackr. In prior work as the President of Stayhealthy, President of US Preventive Medicine, founder/CEO of the Health Record Network in collaboration with Duke University and Medical Center and Chief Marketing Officer of Ernst & Young’s Health practice, Brian has always enjoyed working with people to create value.  Howard Patterson Hezmall, MD  Dr. Hezmall completed his urology residency at the University of Texas Health Science Center in Houston and also served the National Health Service Corps as a Lt. Junior Assistant Surgeon. After three years, he felt it was time to start his own practice in Arlington, Texas. In partnership with Dr. John House, Dr. Hezmall founded Urology Associates of North Texas (UANT) which grew to be one of the largest urologic practices in the country.  Additionally, Dr. Hezmall was a founding member of USMD Inc., a physician-led, integrated health system committed to exemplary patient care. He has always been interested in organized medicine and has served on various committees in the Tarrant County Medical Association (Texas) including past secretary/treasurer, Vice-President, President-elect and is a delegate to the Texas Medical Association. He has been active in the Texas Medical Association since his residency serving as a delegate, committee member and council member.  With 27 years of experience in clinical practice and broad business and management, Dr. Hezmall offers a distinct skill set to Cannovia LLC.  Tori Sichta  5W Public Relations  Account Supervisor  646-632-4571  tsichta@5WPR.com (mailto:tsichta@5WPR.com)    ______________________  If you would rather not receive future communications from 5W PUBLIC RELATIONS, please go to https://u7061146.ct.sendgrid.net/wf/click?upn=NBhTsVIXpTHrhf0NvhZzDd-2BIuOQfkp6rENL5eiggmwgjfXorV-2Bb730JV2hl5MB8Dm2Mft2FEof4k5YJaCZ1xweBaLsRvih3qJYcQq0bXT66DPx3ArAIyNwr-2FaP7NUAdFKcL0saByR-2B-2FARGhYnmWlkuRkyYxoXtaIhiV8Mf9QtoI-3D_6pchHAirW10eM8b14ZAlkZkRllITHdt0G4CIxpgEX-2FYMT-2FVtvkhkoxOwXdc140hQDKip1v9w6NG6f4yMNdzd3I0JbBoOspHl9BOjIgd0xs3DCHCWULMMsI0o0nUAnzsqtC7LG2qH0if83TQOduYTxwzheob7DFCy8OcRzVIf2bSBq1w19QcGrmvSHRb4j0fxqzY4K47-2FboB-2FEEbLAcKOb9ZyoMF-2FbFTPhFcxFUVAXCEZWAwAYMEXSyjQj2suxonbBDDgcN8-2BR4-2Fz1aYF29N6ZKrWh099lK052ZVPKacyJ6pZSjAzpne-2FQ1yXA-2BQsesDlJbLl3VFR4cxJAEEFySe-2BkKRd9qLNUb1p0VvOwOVoCjc-3D  5W PUBLIC RELATIONS, 230 PARK AVENUE, 32ND FLOOR, New York, NY 10169 United States  --  To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to customerservice+unsubscribe@csps.com.

column2: FOLLOWING UP: RE: NEW CLIENT: BioCorRx – Offers Safe and Effective, Live-Saving Implants to Treat Those with Addiction Disorders
column3: Hi Stephanie???,  Hope you are well! I wanted to follow up and see if you would be interested in a story about the BioCorRx naltrexone implant and/or speaking with CEO and Founder of BioCorRx Brady Granier. I look forward to hearing your thoughts.   Best,  Nandi  ------------------------------------------------------------  Hi Stephanie???,  I wanted to reach out and introduce you to a new client I’m representing, BioCorRx – a leading edge healthcare solutions company focused on improving the lives of those struggling with alcohol and opioid addiction.  BioCorRx has developed a sustained-release naltrexone implant which is used to inhibit cravings associated with the utilization of alcohol and opioids. Naltrexone has been approved for use as a tablet, to help thousands of patient fight their addictions, in the United States since 1984. While the drug is very effective to treat addiction, some physicians have observed that the recommended dosage form and efficacy of the drug can present obstacles that can affect the treatment process for addicts especially in the critical early stages. Medical experts have found that the use of a long-acting naltrexone implant presents a way to overcome the hurdles that may arise with the use of the commercially available dosage forms of the drug.  Image  To further discuss BioCorRx and the innovative naltrexone implant, CEO and Founder Brady Granier, is available to be interviewed.  Warmest,  Nandi  About BioCorRx:  BioCorRx Inc. (OTCQB: BICX) is an addiction treatment company offering a unique approach to the treatment of substance abuse addiction. The BioCorRx® Recovery Program, a non-addictive, medication-assisted treatment (MAT) program, consists of two main components. The first component of the program consists of an outpatient implant procedure performed by a licensed physician. The implant delivers the non-addictive medicine, naltrexone, an opioid antagonist that can significantly reduce physical cravings for alcohol and opioids, and can prevent opioid overdose following relapse. The second component of the program developed by BioCorRx Inc. is a Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) program tailored specifically for the treatment of alcoholism and other substance abuse addictions for those receiving long-term naltrexone treatment. The Company also conducts R&D under its controlled subsidiary, BioCorRx Pharmaceuticals. For more information on BICX and product pipeline, visit www.BioCorRx.com (https://u7061146.ct.sendgrid.net/wf/click?upn=84Em28S1K9SvtzcUtu04Epi-2BqMsSs9sfexJnnC3N51I-3D_6pchHAirW10eM8b14ZAlkZkRllITHdt0G4CIxpgEX-2FYMT-2FVtvkhkoxOwXdc140hQDKip1v9w6NG6f4yMNdzd3I0JbBoOspHl9BOjIgd0xs2cTlGnKWlddyQkHI9ESBgKnH31B-2FWM-2FWE8Wurx5Uc-2BbHcQx77BIEzxbH8TYiBaVRcbEXxVCGZJ-2F0ZENiXMBEi8FuzcPEmnFA2KJ1iOcdxQn1szBDatkzq33I29GNOgeiLoD-2BaywcCiZH0UI0P9QQAMtExTy4o2LHQyTCXjxfS8R1jVCSWjbugmJ25SrsX8a9ISYCFNtyMSBKFfP8XwxprvqnWfbrgB8z5gsc-2FZab8a8Jw6JIvD-2FMw5X7wiPUK0LHA-3D .    ______________________  If you would rather not receive future communications from 5W PUBLIC RELATIONS, please go to https://u7061146.ct.sendgrid.net/wf/click?upn=NBhTsVIXpTHrhf0NvhZzDd-2BIuOQfkp6rENL5eiggmwgjfXorV-2Bb730JV2hl5MB8DjrU6vGw-2F8jA1-2BuK1lBAZVEhqGlKeziRGBNHDju6W0vllBbe4sOsLZfGI-2FtA1bhI44HYG9HIYpXdTSKqbH5qjEI0lm0nsaPp5NE8xjsSn4XE-3D_6pchHAirW10eM8b14ZAlkZkRllITHdt0G4CIxpgEX-2FYMT-2FVtvkhkoxOwXdc140hQDKip1v9w6NG6f4yMNdzd3I0JbBoOspHl9BOjIgd0xs2cTlGnKWlddyQkHI9ESBgKnH31B-2FWM-2FWE8Wurx5Uc-2BbHcQx77BIEzxbH8TYiBaVRcbEXxVCGZJ-2F0ZENiXMBEi8FuzcPEmnFA2KJ1iOcdxQn72te2qycNWo-2FZ4BoWlezTsnPbjXTDelaAXa5F3Ygyx0eAP1Nb3C4HSBXGV-2FntWmaHITQCIUrOzNt5ua5D0vakYQu20qWYyOF24NoaDVQq-2BtXaL1fwTfHM0vsTqUuqR0yc0TNvkJcQqZUbIA0LAJtxY-3D  5W PUBLIC RELATIONS, 230 PARK AVENUE, 32ND FLOOR, New York, NY 10169 United States  --  To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to customerservice+unsubscribe@csps.com.

column2: Register Today for the Christian Unity Gathering
column3: Visit the CUG Website   Register today for the Christian Unity Gathering   This year the National Council of Churches will be marking 400 years since the arrival of the first enslaved Africans in America.  At the Christian Unity Gathering we will join together in a public witness at Point Comfort, Virginia, where it is recorded that the suffering of millions began in  a legacy that lives on today through systemic racism that ravages our churches, communities, and lives.     This year's theme:  Ending Racism: Confronting Our Past, Revisiting Our Present and Naming God’s Preferred Future  The Christian Unity Gathering is the signature, annual event of the National Council of Churches.  All members of NCC governance structures, convening tables, and all ecumenical officers and regional, state, and local ecumenical executives are urged to attend.     Register Today!    Hotel: Holiday Inn Newport News-City Center     Nestled in a wooded area off I-64 and overlooking a parking lot, this beautiful hotel is 10 miles from Newport News/Williamsburg International Airport.  The modern rooms and suites feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and minifridges. Suites add living rooms and walk-in showers.     Booking is now available!  When you book, identify yourself with "National Council of Churches Christian Unity." Use the code: NCC to book your room today.     Book your hotel room today!     About the National Council of Churches:      Serving as a leading voice of witness to the living Christ in the public square since 1950, the National Council of the Churches of Christ in the USA (NCC) brings together 38 member communions and more than 35 million Christians in a common expression of God’s love and promise of unity.     The Christian Unity Gathering is the signature annual event of the National Council of Churches.  Join us!  http://nationalcouncilofchurches.z2systems.com/np/clients/nationalcouncilofchurches/unsubscribeEmail.jsp?type=16&<<emailTrackingId>>&userId=TkQZ5mvCuj2Ihdh4uA%2FeiBoaSBbT07Gi

column2: Levi-Strauss: A Biography  (REVIEW COPY? INTERVIEW REQUESTS?)
column3: ** ------------------------------------------------------------  Academic, writer, figure of melancholy, aesthete – Claude Lévi-Strauss (1908-2009) not only transformed his academic discipline, he also profoundly changed the way that we view ourselves and the world around us.  In this award-winning biography, historian Emmanuelle Loyer recounts Lévi-Strauss’s childhood in an assimilated Jewish household, his promising student years as well as his first forays into political and intellectual movements. As a young professor in 1935 Lévi-Strauss left Paris for São Paulo to teach sociology. His rugged expeditions into theBrazilian hinterland, where he discovered the Amerindian Other, made him into ananthropologist. The racial laws of the Vichy regime would force him to leave France yetagain — this time for the US in 1941, where he became Professor Claude L. Strauss, toavoid confusion with the jeans manufacturer.  His return to France, after the war, ushered in the period during which he produced his greatest works: several decades of intense labour in which Lévi-Strauss reinvented anthropology, establishing it as a discipline that offered a new view on the world. In 1955, Tristes Tropiques offered indisputable proof of this the world over. During those years, Lévi-Strauss became something of a national monument, a celebrity intellectual in France. But he always claimed his perspective was a “view from afar,” enabling him to deliver incisive and subversive diagnoses of our waning modernity.  Loyer’s outstanding biography tells the story of a true intellectual adventurer whose unforgettable voice invites us to rethink questions of the human and the meaning of progress. Lévi-Strauss was less of a modern than he was our own great and disquieted contemporary.  The Author:  Emmanuelle Loyer is Professor of Contemporary History at Sciences-Po, Paris. Her biography of Lévi-Strauss was awarded the Prix Femina essai in 2015.   Reviews  “The inspiration that continues to spring forth from the work of Lévi-Strauss is a mystery to many anthropologists. He has told us of the many influences on his work and commentators have argued for yet others but they don’t really account for his extraordinary originality and independence. Emmanuelle Loyer’s thorough account of his life and work may help us resolve this wonderful puzzle.” Maurice Bloch, London School of Economics  "Emmanuelle Loyer has produced a meticulously-researched, intelligent, and sensitive biography worthy of her subject, one of the greatest Francophone intellectuals of the 20th century. Critical yet generous, her portrait of Claude Lévi-Strauss rings true and comes alive on the page." Michael Harkin, University of Wyoming  For review copy and interview requests please contact:  Lucas Jones North American Publicity lucasjones@politybooks.com 9522154807   ============================================================ ** (http://www.twitter.com/) ** (http://www.facebook.com) ** (http://mailchimp.com) Copyright © 2019 Lucas Jones, All rights reserved.  . column2: Hong Kong's Democracy Dilemma
column3: What's Next: Expert takes on the issues shaping tomorrow's news  No Images?  Click here https://hudsoninstitute.cmail19.com/t/i-e-pijuiit-otljknj-e/  Members of the medical profession gather to protest against Hong Kong police brutality at Queen Elizabeth Hospital on August 13, 2019 in Hong Kong. (Getty Images)  Hong Kong has entered its 10th week of demonstrations protesting the erosion of individual freedoms and extension of China's security apparatus. Will protesters succeed in their efforts to "reclaim Hong Kong," or will Beijing and Chief Executive Carrie Lam crackdown on the movement once global attention has shifted? Below, Hudson Institute experts examine what's at stake for Hong Kong, China, and the world.  What's Next: Consequences of a Beijing Intervention  Hudson experts on the possible consequences if Beijing forcibly intercedes:  Patrick Cronin: [https://www.hudson.org/experts/1259-patrick-m-cronin]  “A violent crackdown on Hong Kong protesters would catalyze anti-China sentiment abroad and bolster hardline support for the Chinese Communist Party at home, accelerate ‘mainlandization’ by assimilating Hong Kong into the Greater Bay Area, undermine economic growth, have a chilling effect on relations across the Taiwan strait, and trigger economic sanctions from the United States and others.”  John Lee: [https://www.hudson.org/experts/576-john-lee]  “This would be disastrous for China’s standing and Hong Kong’s status as a secure global financial centre. A financial catastrophe and exodus precipitated by violence committed by Chinese authorities would be a humiliation for the Party and perhaps even an existential political moment for Xi Jinping.”  Robert Spalding: [https://www.hudson.org/experts/1265-robert-spalding]  "A crackdown would have severe ramifications for China’s economy. Hong Kong is China’s window the western capital markets. Many of the Chinese stocks are sold through dollar denominated American Depository Receipts issued in Hong Kong. Many congressional members have begun calling into question the continuation of the special relationship in light of China’s failure to adhere to the one country two systems agreement made when Hong Kong reverted to PRC rule.  It may be that the protests will slow once the school year starts. Given the enormous damage to China’s economy caused by losing its window to the West, the PRC will try to delay a crackdown as far into the fall as possible. However, they would most likely not want protests going on during their October 1st National Day of the People's Republic of China."  5 Key Takeaways from the Protests  From Hudson expert  John Lee [https://www.hudson.org/experts/576-john-lee]'s latest article for The Australian, " China Squirms in Global Spotlight on Hong Kong [https://www.hudson.org/research/15228-china-squirms-in-global-spotlight-on-hong-kong]":  What’s fueling the protests: Beyond the extradition bill, the demonstrations are about the broken promise of genuine universal suffrage (Beijing maintaining its ability to hand-pick the chief executive and other candidates), police violence, political prisoners and the erosion of freedoms promised by China in its 1984 treaty with the UK and which is enshrined in its Basic Law.  A troubling trend: Since 2007, China’s annual spending on domestic security has tripled to about $300 billion, which is one-fifth more than it spends on the People’s Liberation Army.  Citizen suppression: In Xinjiang, China’s domestic security spending has increased ten-fold, from $1.15 billion in 2007 to more than $12 billion by the end of last year. Tibet and the Qinghai Province (with its one-quarter Tibetan population) have had similar increases.  Hong Kong’s future: Hong Kong will likely continue to be only a ritual democracy where people can vote but the leaders must first secure Beijing’s approval. In the best-case scenario, the erosion of freedoms will be be halted temporarily.  Looking to Taiwan: China has long used Hong Kong as proof it was sincere in offering Taiwan significant autonomy and permission to retain its own armed forces under a special “one country, two systems” deal with Taipei upon unification. Developments in Hong Kong ends any chance Taipei will take Beijing at its word.  Want to learn more? Check out Hudson's work on Hong Kong's pro-democracy protests:  LISTEN [https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/hudson-institute-events-podcast/id926521563]  Discussion: Hong Kong's Umbrella Revolution [https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/hudson-institute-events-podcast/id926521563]  Then-editorial page writer for The Wall Street Journal Asia David Feith recounts the pro-democracy protests that embroiled Hong Kong five years ago and laid the foundation for today's demonstrations.  READ [https://thehill.com/opinion/international/457013-chinas-worst-fears-hong-kong-taiwan-and-any-other-democracy]  Op-Ed: C [https://thehill.com/opinion/international/457013-chinas-worst-fears-hong-kong-taiwan-and-any-other-democracy] hina's Worst Fears: Hong Kong, Taiwan, and Any Other Democracy [https://thehill.com/opinion/international/457013-chinas-worst-fears-hong-kong-taiwan-and-any-other-democracy]  Seth Cropsey, director of Hudson's Center for American Seapower, reveals how Hong Kong's distinct tradition of political representation threatens the Chinese Communist Party.  WATCH [https://www.hudson.org/research/15235-us-china-trade-war-beijing-hong-kong-protests-seoul-tokyo-tensions]  Interview: Patrick Cronin on Hong Kong's economic clout [https://www.hudson.org/research/15235-us-china-trade-war-beijing-hong-kong-protests-seoul-tokyo-tensions]  Hudson's Asia-Pacific Security Chair Patrick Cronin examines Hong Kong as a financial powerhouse and the broader economic risks of a Chinese military response.  Hudson Institute [https://www.hudson.org/]  1201 Pennsylvania Avenue, N.W. Suite 400  Washington, DC 20004  Forward   https://hudsoninstitute.forwardtomyfriend.com/i-otljknj-68CE7C99-pijuiit-l-s             Preferences https://hudsoninstitute.updatemyprofile.com/i-pijuiit-68CE7C99-otljknj-g  |   Unsubscribe https://hudsoninstitute.cmail19.com/t/i-u-pijuiit-otljknj-jr/

column2: EXPERT: "How to Spot Aggressive Behavior in Teens & What to Do About It"
column3: Dear Stephanie,  Mass shootings in the US are on the rise, and recent incidents have many people searching for answers. Why are young men pulling the trigger? Why are these young men so angry? While there may not be a simple answer, family therapist Dr. Nadine Pierre-Louis (https://docnjock.com/about-us) is revealing key signs of violent and aggressive behavior in teens—and what to do about it.  “Behavior follows emotion. For boys growing into men, never understanding emotion can lead to a lifetime of negative consequences such as: anxiety, anger issues, and violent behavior,” says Dr. Pierre-Louis, founder of the new Doc and Jock, LLC (https://docnjock.com/about-us) . “We need to start changing this narrative by helping men openly talk about their experiences at every life stage.”  Available for interviews, Q&As, and bylines, Dr. Pierre-Louis can discuss:  · How to prevent violent and aggressive behavior by teaching teens how to cope, understand and express their emotions at an early age · Empathy Matters: Why it’s vital to place a greater emphasis on teaching empathy—especially to young men · How Doc and Jock, LLC is offering resources for young men in foster care, orphanages, juvenile detention centers, and mentor programs · Men and women don’t experience the same event the same way—how to best address this divide and encourage a more open conversation  Please let me know if you’re interested in speaking with Dr. Pierre-Louis and/or receiving a copy of her new book, Richard and the Boyz: The Puberty Experience. Thanks for your time, Stephanie. I look forward to hearing from you!  Have a great day,  Mallory Campoli, Publicity Manager / SMITH PUBLICITY, INC. t: 856.489.8654 ext: 313 / e: mallory@smithpublicity.com (mailto:mallory.campoli@smithpublicity.com)  I look forward to hearing your suggestions. If this opportunity doesn’t fit, I hope it’s appreciated that I presented it to you. Just let me know, and I'll make sure my next pitch is a better fit. column2: The first step in trying to conceive: prenatal vitamins
column3: Hi Stephanie?,  Doing best by your baby is no easy feat from avoiding sushi to exercising regularly, not to mention that you’re inundated with conflicting advice and product options. One of the first decisions you’ll make for you and your baby is which prenatal vitamin to start taking. But, with countless options to consider – organic, chewable, gummies, with iron, without iron – how are you supposed to choose?  Mary Jane Minkin, MD, OB/GYN at Yale University is available to discuss her recommendations for prenatal vitamins and conditions that might be irritated by common ingredients.  Please let me know if you'd like to speak with Dr. Minkin.  Thanks!  Sara  Sara Schwarcz  646.964.4446  sara@gcomworks.com     ______________________  If you would rather not receive future communications from Global Communication Works, please go to https://u7061146.ct.sendgrid.net/wf/click?upn=JI3XGwl6BvjKk-2FipdOLyJRqWBmlRgMQWinaiZ-2BLdpTdLppdtFJkbzPlQbksQElRPywxtm2A4agRgmy7Eh9JNnPlBMpnyuwH3VzWicHAbebJDGKkPHpACnDrOqnkvp3ZiuRIeIItI13MSUD4tSD9yleMK-2Bw3hfNLVU9Sg-2BspAphGwGM-2FDxje3-2Fzn8IG-2BdpP7T_6pchHAirW10eM8b14ZAlkZkRllITHdt0G4CIxpgEX-2FYMT-2FVtvkhkoxOwXdc140hQDKip1v9w6NG6f4yMNdzd3I0JbBoOspHl9BOjIgd0xs0R10Sn8G-2BmUgEPZKx99qzMDckVjClQYFW-2Be-2B21Kxxxg7Sbm6jt95YwrENi-2FPCLjIFl7eG-2BwSYaVE4xZqILimzNxf-2FQQEeb3qd2Zbmu66Dw9RWjwF6sFMRRZYP7pkjhIvTTwbsdhl8zpSluPDOfUqX9qQw8elPdF7VBew3EehO1rGZLqky1IPBR6BpPW9XYFoZMW-2BqEpTFaD2g0mDpPfUqZyHurRiKonDjtrKOTffNHkaYrRE4MucsH-2ByGzpO-2BBrEw-3D  Global Communication Works, 261 Madison Avenue, New York City, NY 10016 United States  --  To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to customerservice+unsubscribe@csps.com.
