column2: National Dog Day is Almost Here: Meet Your Source for All Things Canine
column3: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This email newsletter was sent to you in graphical HTML format. If you're seeing this version, your email program prefers plain text emails. You can read the original version online: https://ymlpmail2.net/z72QES --------------------------------------------------------------------------------   Hi,  Reaching out to keep National Dog Day-- August 26--on your radar. I’d like to offer canine authority Jeffrey Scott Franklin ( https://cobracanine.com/ ), owner and operator of Cobra Canine, as an expert source for anything related to dog training, health and wellness, food, products, lifestyle and manners, rescue and more.  Below is more information. Please let me know if you would like to schedule an interview.  Franklin is owner of Cobra Canine and has worked with over 10,000 pet dogs and families. He gives dogs and their owners a new leash on life and turns pets with behavioral issues into family assets. His memoir by Matthew Duffy, Franklin: The Man Behind the United States Commando Dogs ( https://www.amazon.com/Franklin-behind-United-States-Commando/dp/069206270X/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1544628439&sr=8-1&keywords=Franklin%3A+The+Man+Behind+the+United+States+Commando+Dogs ), offers an exhilarating look into his fascinating career as the pioneer behind Elite Working dogs trained for the United States Military.  Connect with Jeff Franklin on Facebook @franklinjcanine, Twitter @CobraCanine ( https://twitter.com/CobraCanine ), Instagram @franklincanine and visit www.cobracanine.com ( http://www.cobracanine.com/ ).  Franklin has been see on MSNBC ( https://www.msnbc.com/weekends-with-alex-witt/watch/a-special-look-at-heroic-military-dogs-trainers-1455400003556 ) and The Pet Show ( https://wjla.com/news/videos/spotlight-on-cobra-canine-developing-the-finest-quality-canines ).  Topics he can speak on include:  -How to find the right breed for your lifestyle -Holiday pet safety -Training tools that pet owners often overlook -How to introduce a new dog to your pack -What to look for when adopting a shelter dog -Why it’s best to wait to spay or neuter your new puppy -Preparing for a puppy -A well-diversified dog training program for pet owners -Why you must consider genetics when choosing a dog -Why the raw food diet for pets is dangerous to humans -How owning a pet helps people manage stress and anxiety  -Popular misconceptions of dog owners, including:  * Dogs need commands to fix problems * You have to be Alpha to you dog * If your dog goes to the bathroom in the house you should put their nose in it * Your dog will not respect you if they sleep in your bed * Your dog knows they have misbehaved because of their guilty look * Your dog misbehaved while you are gone to get back at you for leaving them alone * If you play tug-of-war your dog will dominant over you * If your dog walks ahead of you they are dominant * And more!  Copies of Franklin are available upon request.  Thanks in advance for your consideration and feedback.  Have a great day,  Joelle  Joelle Speranza Zine and Heard PR Creating roaring results for small businesses and influencers www.zineandheardpr.com www.joellesperanza.com 973-342-3259  Meet me on Instagram: @hellojoelle ( http://www.instagram.com/hellojoelle ) Follow me on Twitter: @joelleinpr ( http://www.twitter.com/joelleinpr ) LinkedIn: Joelle ( https://www.linkedin.com/in/joellecaputa )   _____________________________ Unsubscribe / Change Profile: https://ymlpmail2.net/ugquhsyhgsgumyswgubeggjusby Powered by YourMailingListProvider  --  To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to customerservice+unsubscribe@csps.com.

column2: Is Reality Real?
column3: http://scienceandnonduality.acemlnc.com/lt.php?s=b4c6b86db686cb57d04d16a51583a8d6&i=48A112A7A607   "You knock at the door of Reality. You shake your thought wings, loosen your shoulders, and open."  ~ Rumi  Dear ,  Discovering the nature of reality has always been a fundamental pursuit of human beings. Throughout time sages and scientists have dedicated their lives to the question of truth-what is real and how do we know what we know? It turns out, seeing reality-as-it-is is neither as straightforward or intuitive as we might imagine. From Plato's allegory of the cave to the Hindu   **lila,** or divine play, the notion that Reality is somehow in disguise is a universal theme. The reality we take for granted is not what it appears, we are warned. Even Einstein famously said "  **Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one**."   But why is the truth so hard to see? Is there any objective reality to speak of at all? Even if everything is an illusion, don't we all agree that it is better not to stand in the middle of a busy intersection, or as professor Donald Hoffman puts it, "  **mess with a lion?**" In his paradigm-shifting new article Is Reality Real? How Evolution Blinds us to the Truth About the World , he argues that we actually evolved specifically not to see the truth! "  **Seeing objective reality will make you extinct**," he assures. You see, rather than evolving to give us an accurate representation of objective reality, the sense organs actually evolved to help us know only what we need to know to survive. "  **Evolution ruthlessly selects against truth strategies and for pay-off strategies**," he explains, the pay off, of course, being to escape from the proverbial lion.  If knowing reality-as-it-is for a mystic is enlightenment-and for a scientist, Eureka!-for a caveman, knowing what's really going on beneath our sense experience is completely useless. Imagine needing to learn code just to interpret what can otherwise be represented by an icon on your desktop. And so we evolved a friendly user interface for the world. "  **What we perceive isn't objective reality, but an interface with it**," Hoffman writes. The lion we know, in other words, is an icon of a lion.  So, can objective reality be known at all? Certainly, the search for the nature of reality will never end. But we might be a little more humble knowing that we weren't wired to know very much at all, a little more gentle with our path of awakening knowing that illusion is not just a big problem to solve, but a great protectress paving our way, a little more grateful that a mascarade of beauty is guiding us through our precious evolutionary journey, and a little more aware that, as Nisargadatta put it, "The mind cannot know what is beyond the mind."  Love, Vera and the SAND Team  Is Reality Real?  http://scienceandnonduality.acemlnc.com/lt.php?s=b4c6b86db686cb57d04d16a51583a8d6&i=48A112A7A624  **Is Nondual Awareness at War with Our Humanity: Dorothy Hunt**  Speaking at SAND 18 Dorothy Hunt reminds us that duality, humanity, is not a mistake; it is what makes it possible for the infinite ground of being to see itself, to love itself, to have the experience called form. Our freedom is the freedom to be here, not to transcend form, but to be human as well as divine. Click here to watch.  Dorothy Hunt will also be at the upcoming SAND19 US.  Early Bird Registration is closing soon.   Register for SAND19 US    The deadline for our program, Young Sage's Journey , has been extended to Monday!   If you or a friend 18-23 would like to be a part of this in-depth, eight-week online curriculum as well as gathering at the SAND conference, please fill the application .  SAND US 2019 Pre-Conference Workshops Are Now Available!  October 23 & 24  http://scienceandnonduality.acemlnc.com/lt.php?s=b4c6b86db686cb57d04d16a51583a8d6&i=48A112A7A627  The storms and tragedies of contemporary life can be termed a spiritual crisis in which we must awaken to a greater sense of self or else become more isolated and subject to increasing feelings of isolation and helplessness.  Because all things are ultimately interconnected, the challenges we face and the changes underway signal a genuine transformation of the world.   What we need at this time is not a minor repair, but a major transformation of the world that can only start from the inside. Transformation at the level of the individual heart and soul generates the imagination and collective energy needed to change the conditions of the world.  Join Michael Meade for a Pre-Conference Workshop on Oct. 23rd 4-7pm. Registration is separate from your SAND US ticket. Some workshops have continuing education hours available. Find out more here.  Sign up for SAND19 US Workshops  All of SAND's upcoming events:  SAND19 US  "From Quarks to Love",   **October 23-27**; San Jose, CA  **Webinar Series:**     Living the Embodiment of Grace:  Practicing Ego Relaxation within Relationships, Work and these Wild Times  with Miranda Macpherson August 17, 24, 31     The Healing Power of Illness  with Dr. Ruediger Dahlke August 18 & 25      Living In Deep Listening with Ellen Emmet  - a FREE conversation September 8  The Awakening Body with Ellen Emmet - September 22, 29, October 6  Holotropic States of Consciousness: Technologies of the Sacred ,  a 4-part pre-recorded video series with Stanislav Grof  **Join the SAND Supporter Community:**  As a SAND Supporter, you will be able to access:  * Video and audio content only available to our Supporters  * Free live streaming of the SAND conference  * Discounts on all events and webinars  * Free access to past webinars  SAND is a nonprofit organization, and we would love to have you as part of our community!   Join SAND!    An event by our partner: The Scientific & Medical Network   www.beyondthebrain.org   Beyond the Brain is the world's premier conference series exploring theory and research on consciousness beyond the brain.   This year it is being held at the University of Westminster in London, UK, from November 1 to 3, 2019. Speakers include Rupert Sheldrake, Ken Wilber, Betty Kovacs and Steve Taylor.   Three-day, two-day and one-day tickets are available. For more information and to book tickets, go to www.beyondthebrain.org  An event by our partner: Purpose Guides Institute  Purpose Guides Institute  is a school helping people to discover their soul-level calling. In this short documentary film, 22 renowned teachers share the essential gems that will guide you in living a life of meaning, wonder, and soul-infused adventure. http://scienceandnonduality.acemlnc.com/lt.php?s=b4c6b86db686cb57d04d16a51583a8d6&i=48A112A7A630 Click here to watch the film and Discover Your Purpose    Science And Nonduality (SAND) is a community inspired by timeless wisdom, informed by cutting-edge science, and grounded in personal experience. We come together in an open-hearted exploration of the big questions of life to embody our interconnectedness and celebrate our humanity.  http://scienceandnonduality.acemlnc.com/lt.php?s=b4c6b86db686cb57d04d16a51583a8d6&i=48A112A7A617      http://scienceandnonduality.acemlnc.com/lt.php?s=b4c6b86db686cb57d04d16a51583a8d6&i=48A112A7A618      http://scienceandnonduality.acemlnc.com/lt.php?s=b4c6b86db686cb57d04d16a51583a8d6&i=48A112A7A619      http://scienceandnonduality.acemlnc.com/lt.php?s=b4c6b86db686cb57d04d16a51583a8d6&i=48A112A7A620   You're receiving this email because you are part of the SAND Community. You can update your preferences  or unsubscribe from this list .  science and nonduality, 1251 gold ridge rd, sebastopol, CA 95472, United States

column2: Williamson supporters are hiding in plain sight
column3: View this email in your browser (https://mailchi.mp/marianne2020/supporters_8_16_19-253869?e=86750cd953) https://www.marianne2020.com/ FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE August 16, 2019 Patricia Ewing Communications Director Press@marianne2020.com (mailto:Press@marianne2020.com) 443-906-1495   The Press keep asking, who are Marianne Williamson’s supporters?  Williamson supporters are hiding in plain sight The Press keep asking, who are Marianne Williamson’s supporters? Look around. They are your sister, your hairdresser, the guy in the cubby next to you, your friend from church, that PTA parent, etc. This KTVU story by Jana Katsuyama does a great job of showing and telling who they are.  Williamson supporters cross all demographic boundaries and are hard to label in ways that political reporters use to explain things. They are young and old. All colors. All religions. But many are new to political activism and not being called by the pollsters. Here is their story.  Presidential candidate Marianne Williamson visits San Francisco By Jana Katsuyama, KTVU Posted Aug 16, 2019  https://www.ktvu.com/news/presidential-candidate-marianne-williamson-visits-san-francisco https://www.ktvu.com/news/presidential-candidate-marianne-williamson-visits-san-francisco  Some say Williamson caught their attention in the July debate and has inspired them in a way other Democrats have not.  "I've never been inspired by politics. And I'm inspired to listen to her and to actually start to be an activist and make a difference," said Cassie Breeggemann of San Francisco, "I actually didn't vote in the last election. But I do plan to vote for this one.”  'She's talking about other issues in the way that they aren't. One for sure she talked about tonight. She talked about reparations for American descendants of slavery," said Rita Forte of Oakland.  ******  Columnist identifies some of the secrets of Williamson’s appeal  Dahleen Glanton from the Chicago Tribune identifies the key to Marianne Williamson’s appeal in the story below.  Marianne Williamson’s zen is a welcome antidote to Donald Trump’s vitriol By DAHLEEN GLANTON CHICAGO TRIBUNE AUG 01, 2019  During this scary and angry moment in time, a simple wave of her wand seems to cast away our anxiety and replace it with zen. She reminds us that there is a cure for the Trump-induced cancer that is threatening to consume us. There is an antidote, for sure, but to find it, we must delve deeper into ourselves.  She tells us that the only way to combat hate is with love. It sounds kind of hokey in the context of a heated political debate, but maybe there is some truth to it. https://www.chicagotribune.com/columns/dahleen-glanton/ct-dahleen-glanton-democratic-debates-mary-ann-williamson-zen-20190801-mglwweu4yvgyblyjd3uuvklkkq-story.html *****  Marianne Williamson is a new voice to lots of old school politicos  Despite being a popular author with 4 NYT bestsellers under her belt, she has not been a known quantity to the political class in DC and New York and Chris Cillizza was kind enough to give them a Marianne primer this week.  Understanding the Marianne Williamson phenomenon CNN - Chris Cillizza  After the first CNN Democratic debate, Marianne Williamson was the most-Googled candidate in 49 states. But does she stand a chance? Here's everything you need to know about the bestselling author, spiritual guru and meme-worthy 2020 presidential candidate. https://www.cnn.com/videos/politics/2019/08/15/the-point-with-chris-cillizza-marianne-williamson.cnn  ###  ============================================================ ** (https://twitter.com/marwilliamson) ** (https://www.facebook.com/williamsonmarianne/) ** (https://www.instagram.com/mariannewilliamson/) ** (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXAMXGAP0YnBxtc8brSSbjg) ** (https://www.marianne2020.com) Copyright © 2019 Marianne Williamson for President, All rights reserved.  Our mailing address is: Marianne Williamson for President 1787 Tribute Rd Ste K Sacramento, CA 95815-4404 USA  Want to change how you receive these emails? You can ** update your preferences (https://marianne2020.us20.list-manage.com/profile?u=7d2c52ee9b55adf2cd969c713&id=0761d20e98&e=86750cd953) or ** unsubscribe from this list (https://marianne2020.us20.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=7d2c52ee9b55adf2cd969c713&id=0761d20e98&e=86750cd953&c=055beacd68) . column2: Why Introducing Kids to Newspapers in the Digital Age is Important
column3: Stephanie?,  KidScoop (https://u7061146.ct.sendgrid.net/wf/click?upn=G62jSYfZdO-2F12d8lSllQB-2BDfRpPLa8cx3RdtkzXO234zJyiki0px7G0HrIRVV00Q_6pchHAirW10eM8b14ZAlkZkRllITHdt0G4CIxpgEX-2FYMT-2FVtvkhkoxOwXdc140hQDKip1v9w6NG6f4yMNdzd3I0JbBoOspHl9BOjIgd0xs1ZoqiRaHbSAU4tmzrjCp-2BK3HPgKXXvAhaRXOaldgUaujscFM8vWTkILMXQzYE36YWZ1tyy-2BIfJM90llHt7ZGeSMt4YrWPV6P2ClJE6rUiB0SwngrZtkrDvCKVeHDBildvL7Vjowv2AEgR4o9z2ftjJFJ3accy5YUweixUJ9IYWzG6d0AYftWSGGZ16iGe7oLumZH0HAj4PIf6mO4g5tAcpfdXaH-2BkBO8SJl8I4KSkkqo2wwk5lZlwCxTVazlz3qpQ-3D  creator, Vicki Whiting, began making educational content for newspapers over two decades ago. As an educator, she saw that children really loved reading the newspaper but there wasn't any content there for them. So, she started making her own. She compiled interesting factoids, puzzles, drawing challenges, and more, and pitched it to her local paper. Years later, her KidScoop content now appears weekly in over 300 newspapers around the country and in Canada.  "There are so many benefits to including children in community newspapers," Whiting says. "I wanted children to feel like they were part of the community, because they are."  Now, Vicki has branched out and is offering content from her KidScoop series in two new "Learn & Draw" Books. With the help of illustrator Jeff Schinkel, the two books are A Kid's Guide to Drawing Cartoon Animals (https://u7061146.ct.sendgrid.net/wf/click?upn=G62jSYfZdO-2F12d8lSllQBxexAwTKJVlI7rBzN2jsJWqSDs15xwiMy4WRFOOjnspZQnS8yNCw-2FX7hLkmycfrGAy197XGfjHNVlmIbeC43tjBWpJD1M0-2BYbhHH-2FEiVGVp8SV28W9GZStEJhnS00CAgGVtlSAV1U-2FAgHCw75-2FaNDenvjvnmGvVYm6aE7UHwzCzK_6pchHAirW10eM8b14ZAlkZkRllITHdt0G4CIxpgEX-2FYMT-2FVtvkhkoxOwXdc140hQDKip1v9w6NG6f4yMNdzd3I0JbBoOspHl9BOjIgd0xs1ZoqiRaHbSAU4tmzrjCp-2BK3HPgKXXvAhaRXOaldgUaujscFM8vWTkILMXQzYE36YWZ1tyy-2BIfJM90llHt7ZGeSMt4YrWPV6P2ClJE6rUiB0e5PXYiLbIzYNWCVYXWsbgV7FxPVVxX5K4kpUum15GQFM-2BaK9XC-2BRTb-2F3-2FTlJ-2BCVcbbk5I0CaI-2F64as-2FVVMcnQGiqFtBgjOmvkFqd0xiLHP1edEFdirR-2F8emgbkbVxIGf5ocWLZbst4oK69sX2phohE-3D  and Mind-Boggling Animal Puzzles: A Treasury of Fabulous Facts, Secret Codes, Games, Mazes, and More! (https://u7061146.ct.sendgrid.net/wf/click?upn=G62jSYfZdO-2F12d8lSllQB04LsI1UzbMdFDyOY-2FQV-2FfKZJMGlBMum5AE3xojqeNV636nnVOxtv-2FxrEKX89FQ0tn52ZX9BqPDBsOtpqzX5P7bzOUWV-2FDOxI-2B31V9vTaLTR-2BKqS68yueSLq-2BpFjPlW-2FxZGxTiySQXh8V-2Fbqs6Cl9TkUIJOWVEFUjZB8m4NkyfIVwFvSZsbZXBi2X3KwqDuC2A-3D-3D_6pchHAirW10eM8b14ZAlkZkRllITHdt0G4CIxpgEX-2FYMT-2FVtvkhkoxOwXdc140hQDKip1v9w6NG6f4yMNdzd3I0JbBoOspHl9BOjIgd0xs1ZoqiRaHbSAU4tmzrjCp-2BK3HPgKXXvAhaRXOaldgUaujscFM8vWTkILMXQzYE36YWZ1tyy-2BIfJM90llHt7ZGeSMt4YrWPV6P2ClJE6rUiB0eeVCmpm8tVT1o9ythwEiJbLZTALwYhqVj9VqlbPe-2B5y-2FcS4apqBoI-2BNYbCfuhLWxjblcLRh6zSEv1TpJFIFTOY7MJnDN6nzUr8Y2uqAF4Dj-2FePi7KGgTIoSHJQQIC8Z4ROAU9jSC5QZghlzWQSP03Q-3D  Surrounding the release of the series, Vicki is currently available for interviews and can discuss:    · Why Teaching Children About Community Newspapers is Important, Despite Our Tech-Driven World · How Children-friendly Newspapers Can Improve Family Values · The Positive Impacts of Reading the Newspaper with Your Child · Ways to Model Healthy Reading Habits with Your Children · Reasons to Read the Newspaper With Your Kid · How to Encourage a Love of Community with Your Children · How the Ability to Read is Key to Success in Life · How Reading in Print is Different from Reading Digitally and Why it's Essential for Kids (and Adults) to Read Print in Addition to Digital · How Small Motor Activities Such as Drawing and Pencil Activities Such as Mazes, Word Searches, etc Are Key to Brain Development in Children  "It's more important than ever to include children in conversations about community," Whiting says. "They are our future, so they have a right to be at the table."   Please let me know if you would like to speak to Vicki, would like advanced copies of the books, or would like to request any excerpts and/or images from the books! Looking forward to hearing from you.  Elizabeth Martins Public Relations Manager emartins@foxchapelpublishing.com www.foxchapelpublishing.com column2: The Trump Administration Just Took an Important Step for Religious Freedom
column3: The government won't be able to coerce organizations into abandoning principle...  View this email in your browser (https://mailchi.mp/caapusa/bill-owens-of-caap-215485?e=d2b3ef1fec) https://secure.anedot.com/coalition-of-african-american-pastors-usa/dream-derailed-sponsors?mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID] http://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fmailchi.mp%2Fcaapusa%2Fbill-owens-of-caap-215485&mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID] Share (http://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fmailchi.mp%2Fcaapusa%2Fbill-owens-of-caap-215485&mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID]) http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=The+Trump+Administration+Just+Took+an+Important+Step+for+Religious+Freedom:&mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID] https%3A%2F%2Fmailchi.mp%2Fcaapusa%2Fbill-owens-of-caap-215485 Tweet (http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=The+Trump+Administration+Just+Took+an+Important+Step+for+Religious+Freedom:&mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID] https%3A%2F%2Fmailchi.mp%2Fcaapusa%2Fbill-owens-of-caap-215485) http://us6.forward-to-friend.com/forward?u=92112f469785e1152be1993c1&id=3d6869ff27&e=d2b3ef1fec Forward to a Friend (http://us6.forward-to-friend.com/forward?u=92112f469785e1152be1993c1&id=3d6869ff27&e=d2b3ef1fec)   ** The Trump Administration Just Took an Important Step for Religious Freedom ------------------------------------------------------------ Dear Partner,  It wasn't long ago when I was writing to warn you about the trend toward using government to bully Christians into discarding their values.  I wasn't just referring to wedding cakes. Organizations that worked with state and federal governments were at risk of losing that opportunity unless they toed the line on social issues. There was little room for freedom of conscience or the tenets of your faith if they clashed with the prevailing administration's views of sexual morality, same-sex marriage, abortion, or gender.  Depending on who held power, it was easy to imagine a situation where Christian organizations would not be permitted to work with the government unless they shed their beliefs. Because that was out of the question, the result was an anti-faith bias in federal contracting.  Fortunately, we now have an administration that protects religious freedom.  President Trump has already issued an executive order regarding respect for religious freedom and conscience. Now, his administration is expanding those protections. The Department of Labor’s Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs (OFCCP) has issued a new proposed rule clarifying that religious organizations that contract with the federal government are protected. They may make business and employment decisions consistent with their beliefs without fear of sanction.  You can read the proposed rule here (https://s3.amazonaws.com/public-inspection.federalregister.gov/2019-17472.pdf?mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID]) . Note how it references some of the recent Supreme Court decisions protecting religious freedom and states that the government's role should be, "to protect religious exercise - and not to impede it." It also instructs federal agencies to construe the rule broadly, giving the highest level of protection to religious freedom.  In CAAP's press release (https://caapusa.org/2019/08/press-release-caap-praises-trump-administration-for-protecting-religious-freedom/?mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID]) on the rule, we praised the Trump administration for keeping the promise to protect freedom of religion. Too many organizations were concerned that the federal government would try to coerce them into abandoning their principles, and the administration took action to fix that. As I said in the release:  "Finally, people of faith have an assurance that they are not being pushed out of the public square and that their beliefs will be respected. Freedom of religion is the real civil rights battle of our time, and it’s good to see President Trump defend it."  Of course, we still need to wait for the rule to become final. And we need to recognize that a future president could undo it. That's why it's important to keep working to elect politicians that recognize the importance of religious liberty.  This rule is an important step towards protecting Christianity in the public square, but there's still more work to be done. Fortunately, CAAP is ready to keep fighting for our rights!  For faith, family and freedom, Rev. Bill Owens  P.S. Your prayers and financial support will help us put this country on the right path. Please help us as we strengthen our grassroots network and work to educate and inspire pastors, community leaders, and politicians to defend our Christian rights. Donate to CAAP today!  (https://causes.anedot.com/caap-email-appeal?mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID])  The Coalition of African American Pastors, [aka] The Coalition for American Action and Principles, is a grass roots movement of Christians who believe in traditional family values in American public life.  We believe in protecting the lives of the unborn, and defending the sacred institution of marriage. CAAP does not endorse, support, or oppose any candidate for political office. Any mention of public figures herein is purely for discussion and educational purposes and should not be interpreted as a statement of electoral support or opposition.  *The Coalition of African American Pastors is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization.  Your donations to The Coalition of African American Pastors may be tax deductible to the fullest extent of the law.  No goods or services were received in exchange for any contributions.  You should consult a tax advisor regarding any tax deductions.  CAAP does not endorse any politician or political campaign. Make a Donation to CAAP! (https://causes.anedot.com/caap-email-appeal?mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID]) http://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fmailchi.mp%2Fcaapusa%2Fbill-owens-of-caap-215485&mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID] Share (http://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fmailchi.mp%2Fcaapusa%2Fbill-owens-of-caap-215485&mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID]) http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=The+Trump+Administration+Just+Took+an+Important+Step+for+Religious+Freedom:&mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID] https%3A%2F%2Fmailchi.mp%2Fcaapusa%2Fbill-owens-of-caap-215485 Tweet (http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=The+Trump+Administration+Just+Took+an+Important+Step+for+Religious+Freedom:&mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID] https%3A%2F%2Fmailchi.mp%2Fcaapusa%2Fbill-owens-of-caap-215485) http://us6.forward-to-friend.com/forward?u=92112f469785e1152be1993c1&id=3d6869ff27&e=d2b3ef1fec Forward to a Friend (http://us6.forward-to-friend.com/forward?u=92112f469785e1152be1993c1&id=3d6869ff27&e=d2b3ef1fec) http://caapusa.org/membership/rise/?mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID] Rise is CAAP's exclusive grassroots network, uniting people of every race, creed, culture, and background. You donâ€™t need to be a Pastor. You donâ€™t need to be African American. All you need in order to join RISE is a desire to help us create a new movement for faith, family, and justice. Join RISE! (http://caapusa.org/membership/rise/?mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID]) http://caapusa.org/membership/caap-clergy-membership/?mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID] Men and women of faith working together to promote and protect the values we hold dear. We welcome clergy (bishops, pastors, ministers, evangelists, every member of the clergy) from any race to join our movement to protect and defend faith and family! CAAP Clergy Membership (http://caapusa.org/membership/caap-clergy-membership/?mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID]) http://caapusa.org/caap-womens-ministry/?mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID] The CAAP Womenâ€™s Ministry is composed of women of faith and conviction, working together to support and serve women. We welcome women of all races to join our womenâ€™s ministry to unify and give voice to religious, social, cultural, moral and public policy issues of our day. Join the CAAP Women's Ministry! (http://caapusa.org/membership/caap-womens-ministry-membership/?mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID])  ============================================================ Send all donations and correspondence to: CAAP-West Business Office 2654 W. Horizon Ridge Pkwy Suite B5-139 Henderson, NV 89052 ** (http://www.twitter.com/?mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID]) ** (http://www.facebook.com?mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID]) ** (http://mailchimp.com?mc_cid=3d6869ff27&mc_eid=[UNIQID]) Copyright © 2019 newsletter@caapusa.org, All rights reserved. column2: REVISED TUNE IN ALERT: Grant, Carr and Peck announce nominees for the 50th Annual GMA Dove Awards, August 14
column3: To view this email online, paste this link into your browser: https://t.e2ma.net/message/fa3dfd/j16t49      TUNE IN ALERT:  GRANT, CARR AND PECK ANNOUNCE NOMINEES FOR THE 50TH ANNUAL GMA DOVE AWARDS AUGUST 14   Christian and Gospel music's biggest night celebrates its golden milestone   (https://t.e2ma.net/click/fa3dfd/j16t49/jp1t3p)  Natalie Grant  Download Image (https://t.e2ma.net/click/fa3dfd/j16t49/zh2t3p)   (https://t.e2ma.net/click/fa3dfd/j16t49/fa3t3p)  Jekalyn Carr  Download Image (https://t.e2ma.net/click/fa3dfd/j16t49/v23t3p)   (https://t.e2ma.net/click/fa3dfd/j16t49/bv4t3p)  Karen Peck  Download Image (https://t.e2ma.net/click/fa3dfd/j16t49/rn5t3p)  Wortman Works Media & Marketing  |  www.wortmanworks.com  NASHVILLE, Tenn. (Aug. 12, 2019) - The Gospel Music Association (GMA) celebrates its golden anniversary on Christian and Gospel music's biggest night. The 50th Annual GMA Dove Awards will take place in Nashville, Tennessee on Tuesday, October 15 honoring outstanding achievements and excellence in Christian music since 1969. The 50th celebration will be a powerful evening of high-energy and unforgettable vocal events paying tribute to 50 years of special appearances and sensational stage highlights over the decades. Performances representing modern Rock, Rap/Hip Hop, Pop/Contemporary, Inspirational, Southern Gospel, Bluegrass, Country, Worship and more will make up an evening praising the rich musical diversity from the past, present and future of Gospel and Christian music. Purchase tickets here (https://t.e2ma.net/click/fa3dfd/j16t49/7f6t3p).   WHO: Natalie Grant, Jekalyn Carr, Karen Peck   WHAT: Facebook 'Live' announcing nominees for the 50th Annual GMA Dove Awards  WHEN: Wednesday, August 14, 2018 at 10 a.m. CDT  WHERE: www.facebook.com/GMADoveAwards (https://t.e2ma.net/click/fa3dfd/j16t49/n86t3p)  Press release to follow with full list of nominees or view the list at www.doveawards.com (https://t.e2ma.net/click/fa3dfd/j16t49/307t3p).  The GMA Dove Awards celebrate the contributions of artists from every style of Christian/Gospel music. Nominees are determined by over 1,600 professional members, and winners will be voted on by the entire GMA membership of nearly 2,500. For more information or to purchase tickets, click here (https://t.e2ma.net/click/fa3dfd/j16t49/jt8t3p).  The awards will air globally for the 4th straight year on Trinity Broadcast Network (TBN) with Christian and Worship Music being some of the most played songs around the world.  About Gospel Music Association & Foundation: Founded in 1964, the Gospel Music Association serves as the face and voice for the Gospel/Christian music community and is dedicated to exposing, promoting and celebrating the Gospel through music of all styles. The GMA produces the GMA Dove Awards, The GMA Hall of Fame Induction and Honors Ceremony and the IMMERSE Conference. For more on supporting the GMA or becoming a member, please visit www.gospelmusic.org (https://t.e2ma.net/click/fa3dfd/j16t49/zl9t3p).   Apply for media credentials HERE (https://t.e2ma.net/click/fa3dfd/j16t49/feau3p).  Apply for publicist credentials HERE (https://t.e2ma.net/click/fa3dfd/j16t49/v6au3p).  Application deadline is September 21, 2019.  MEDIA CONTACT:  Jules Wortman   Wortman Works Media & Marketing   jwortman@wortmanworks.com (mailto:jwortman@wortmanworks.com?subject=Show%20this%20subject%20automatically)  615.260.9985  Conner McKiever  Wortman Works Media & Marketing   cmckiever@wortmanworks.com (mailto:cmckiever@wortmanworks.com?subject=Show%20this%20subject%20automatically)  812.736.6080   (https://t.e2ma.net/click/fa3dfd/j16t49/bzbu3p)   (https://t.e2ma.net/click/fa3dfd/j16t49/rrcu3p)   (https://t.e2ma.net/click/fa3dfd/j16t49/7jdu3p)   (https://t.e2ma.net/click/fa3dfd/j16t49/nceu3p)      1300 Division St. Ste. 205 | Nashville, TN 37203 United States  This email was sent to journal@csps.com. column2: Infographic and Tips:  TurfMutt Shares Family Yard Fall To-Dos
column3: Hi,  TurfMutt is the official spokesdog for the Outdoor Power Equipment Institute’s (OPEI) environmental education program (http://www.turfmutt.com) .  A former rescue dog, TurfMutt paws it forward by helping kids and their families learn about the benefits of their family yard and taking care of the green spaces around them.  We hope you will share the Infographic Family Yard Fall To-Dos with your readers and followers via social media or in your media outlets.  Link to Infographic: http://www.livinglandscapesmatter.com/wp-content/uploads/OPEI_Fall-Family-Yard-ToDos-From-Mutt_FINAL.png  If you would like to interview (or e-interview) Kris Kiser of OPEI (http://www.opei.org) about caring for our living landscapes, please let me know.  For more information visit www.savelivinglandscapes.com (http://www.savelivinglandscapes.com) .  The tips are also copied below as text if you would like to feature them.   Kind Regards,  Debbi Mayster  On Behalf of OPEI and TurfMutt  240.988.6243  Family Yard Fall To-Dos  TurfMutt knows that in many areas, fall is a dog-gone good time to spend in your family yard.  It’s also the top-dog time of year to prep our living landscape for another favorite season—spring. Here’s what you need to do now to have a fabulous and TurfMutt-approved family yard this fall and beyond  Remove Leaves: Mulching your leaves rather than raking and bagging is good for your lawn and the environment. As shredded leaves decompose, they feed your lawn, naturally.  Aerate the Family Lawn: Aerating prevents soil from becoming compacted and covered with thatch - a thick layer of roots, stems and debris that blocks water, oxygen and nutrients from reaching the soil.  Mow at the Right Height: Keep cutting your grass until the first hard frost. Find the just-right length for your species, typically between 2-3 inches, to keep your grass healthy when it turns cold.   Water Wisely: If you’re not getting at least an inch of water a week from Mother Nature, you’ll want to keep watering through the fall. Install watering solutions, such as smart controllers on irrigation systems, to help conserve water.  ______________________ If you would rather not receive future communications from The Outdoor Power Equipment Institute, please go to http://FourLeafPublicRelations.pr-optout.com/OptOut.aspx?2240313x36785x72313x1x4584030x24000x6&Email=customerservice%40csmonitor.com. column2: Exciting Breakthroughs For Cluster Headache Sufferers Announced At The Upcoming 14th Annual Clusterbusters Conference
column3: Dear Stephanie Hanes :  While most people experience headaches at some point in life, nothing compares to the excruciating pain of cluster headaches. These are unbelievably painful, debilitating headaches that are so severe that those inflicted with them are twenty times more likely than the national average to commit suicide as a way to escape the pain.  Clusterbusters is a patient advocacy and educational resource group who are also very dedicated to advancing research that directly affects cluster headache patients. This year, they will hold their 14th Annual Conference in Dallas, Texas. For more details on the event, please read the following press release.  We are available for interviews to discuss breakthroughs in the treatment of these devastating headaches, or to provide information on the conference. Please don't hesitate to contact us. Thank you.  Clusterbusters website address: www.clusterbusters.org   President Bob Wold  bob@clusterbusters.org  630-290-1979 Conference Chair Eileen Brewer  conference@clusterbusters.org  (This press release may be reprinted in part or entirety by any print or broadcast media outlet, or used by any means of social media sharing) FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE  Exciting Breakthroughs For Cluster Headache Sufferers Announced At The Upcoming 14th Annual Clusterbusters Conference   **Austin, TX, August 15, 2019** ? The Clusterbusters 14th Annual Patient Conference, likely to be the largest gathering of cluster headache patients in history, will be September 19-22 at The Embassy Suites by Hilton, DFW North, Texas. Bringing together patients, their families, doctors and researchers to support and educate all involved, Clusterbusters also advances research, advocates for improved treatments and collaborates on legislative changes needed to end needless suffering and financial inequality.  Clusterbusters is uniting the voices of the families suffering from this debilitating disease. Cluster headaches, nicknamed "suicide headaches,” have a suicide rate 20 times the national average. The pain is so severe that most people suffering from the disease hide their suffering from family, friends and employers; celebrities and sports figures hide their condition for fear of losing their high-paying jobs.  Clusterbusters is directly involved in supporting exciting new research to be featured during the weekend conference. Presentations will include discussions on the state of the headache community, information about new and upcoming treatments, and information on current and planned research. Inspiration is the theme, highlighted throughout the program, commencing the evening of the 19th with registration and a cocktail hour reception.  For more information and conference registration, please visit: http://ascotmedianews.com/em/lt.php?c=18381&m=20741&nl=1198&s=f56e244f21aead307c5458b70ab88d81&lid=273800&l=-https--clusterbusters.org/event/14th-annual-cluster-headache-patient-conference-september-19-2019/    ###  TIP SHEET:  Speakers include:  •    Dr. Brian McGeeney •    Dr. James Martinez •    Mr. Joseph McKay •    Mr. Mark Massullo •    Dr. Elizabeth Loder •    Ms. Christina Treppendahl •    Ms. Nicole Hemmenway •    Dr. Emmanuelle Schindler •    Mr. Kevin Lenaburg •    Dr. Nate Bennett •    Dr. Mark Burish •    Dr. Shivang Joshi •    Mr. Dennis Pohlenz •    Mr. William Mingus •    Mr. Bob Wold •    Mrs. Eileen Brewer  Many more speakers will be announced soon and will be posted on the event pages.  This event is made possible by Clusterbuster sponsors: Eli Lilly, ElectroCore and  2FunGuys.  ###  Ascot Media Group is compliant with the can-spam act. Contact information: Ascot Media Group, Inc. Post Office Box 2394, Friendswood, TX 77549. Main: 281.333.3507. Fax: 800.854.2207. If you would prefer not to receive press releases and other information from Ascot Media Group, Incorporated, please respond with the word "remove” in the subject line. In this instance, we may not have the correct email address on file, therefore please provide all possible email addresses that route directly or forward to you. column2: NEW STUDY: High Teacher Pay in Massachusetts Leads to Better ACT Scores for Students
column3: NEW STUDY: High Teacher Pay in Leads to Better ACT Scores for Connecticut Students New Study Confirms Higher Teacher Salaries Correlates to Better ACT Scores NEW STUDY: Lowest Teacher Pay in Nation Impacting Mississippi ACT Scores Students in States With Highest Teacher Salaries Do 17% Better on ACT Hi Stephanie-- A new study https://outreach.topagency.com/campaigns/sr6609lrg2f26/track-url/bp6263scdj83f/4db364d74d867f984f6aec9974b8772559d6d3ff from Brainly— the world's largest peer-to-peer learning community for students, parents and teachers— has found a striking correlation between teacher pay and performance on standardized test scores. The higher the average teacher pay, the better students performed on the ACT, giving them a boost in the race for college acceptance. In the study, Brainly compared the National Education Association's estimated state averages for public school teacher salaries to the state averages for the SAT and ACT.  Overall, Brainly found that the states with the higher average teacher salary tended to see higher average ACT test scores. For instance, higher paying states like Massachusetts where the average teacher salary is $82,042 per year saw an average ACT test score of 25.5, whereas states with lower teacher salaries, such as Mississippi ($45,574 per year) saw average scores seven points lower (18.6).  Infographic attached.  So which states saw the strongest correlation between teacher salaries and test scores? Here’s a snapshot of the findings. * The northeast topped the list. Connecticut topped the list with the fifth highest average teacher salary ($76,455) and the best ACT scores in the country (25.6). Massachusetts came in second ($82,024/25.5); New York came next with the highest teacher pay ($85,889) and the third highest ACT score (24.5).  * States with lower salaries saw lower test scores. For instance, the state with the lowest average teacher salary, Mississippi ($45,574) also had the lowest average ACT score at 18.6. Arizona was the next lowest ACT score at 19.2 and the sixth lowest teacher salary at $49,892. * The higher the salary tier, the better the student outcome. To compare states holistically, they divided the states into three salary tiers: > $50,000; $50,000 - $60,000;  --  To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to customerservice+unsubscribe@csps.com.

column2: New stress-relieving plush toys launch today – Belly-Rub Pubs
column3: View this email in your browser (https://mailchi.mp/9ce69deac357/new-stress-relieving-plush-toys-launch-today-belly-rub-pubs?e=ad8bc95d2b) I wanted to let you know about today’s launch of Belly-Rub Pubs, adorable plush toys that provide a fun and unique method of stress-relief for users of all ages.  Designed to playfully introduce proven stress management techniques through a unique three-step stress-relief approach of rub belly-breathe-laugh, these toys are available in four unique characters, each standing for their own way of dealing with stress.  For those who do not have a pet to help them relax, the new toys are a tongue-in-cheek alternative. A playful approach to a serious topic – stress, they are designed to integrate proven stress management techniques and offer users an introduction to mindfulness by letting them focus on belly-rubbing and taking their minds off of stressful thoughts.  The toys will turn stressful moments and personal fails into “belly-rub” moments, allowing users to relax, have a good laugh and remember to keep a playful outlook on life.  An online press kit with images is available at: http://bit.ly/2YLC4ri?utm_source=BRP+PRESS+LIST&utm_campaign=979242f3bc-EMAIL_CAMPAIGN_2019_08_14_08_21&utm_medium=email&utm_term=0_b73c00082d-979242f3bc-128375601  An Indiegogo Campaign (https://igg.me/at/bellyrubpups?utm_source=BRP+PRESS+LIST&utm_campaign=979242f3bc-EMAIL_CAMPAIGN_2019_08_14_08_21&utm_medium=email&utm_term=0_b73c00082d-979242f3bc-128375601) launches today featuring limited Early Bird specials of $25 USD, as well as several other perks for backers. The campaign can be seen at: https://igg.me/at/bellyrubpups?utm_source=BRP+PRESS+LIST&utm_campaign=979242f3bc-EMAIL_CAMPAIGN_2019_08_14_08_21&utm_medium=email&utm_term=0_b73c00082d-979242f3bc-128375601  If you have any questions, please let me know. Thanks!  Glenn Mandel The LaunchPad Agency 760-798-1563 glenn@launchpadagency.com (mailto:glenn@launchpadagency.com)   Awarenics Introduces Belly-Rub Pups(™), Adorable Plush Toys That Provide a Playful Approach to a Serious Topic - Stress!  Three-Step Approach of “Rub belly-breathe-Laugh” Playfully Introduces Easy Stress Management Techniques for Users of All Ages; Indiegogo Campaign Launches to Fund Product’s Final Development  (Matzendorf, Switzerland) - August 15, 2019 - Awarenics today introduced Belly-Rub Pups (https://bellyrubpups.com/?utm_source=BRP+PRESS+LIST&utm_campaign=979242f3bc-EMAIL_CAMPAIGN_2019_08_14_08_21&utm_medium=email&utm_term=0_b73c00082d-979242f3bc-128375601) , adorable plush toys that provide a fun and unique method of stress-relief for users of all ages.  Designed to playfully introduce proven stress management techniques through a unique three-step stress-relief approach of rub belly-breathe-laugh, Belly-Rub Pups are available in four unique characters, each standing for their own way of dealing with stress - Frankie (mindfulness), Chica Loca (exercise & fitness), Norman (mental health) and Romeo (pure love).  The Indiegogo Campaign (https://igg.me/at/bellyrubpups?utm_source=BRP+PRESS+LIST&utm_campaign=979242f3bc-EMAIL_CAMPAIGN_2019_08_14_08_21&utm_medium=email&utm_term=0_b73c00082d-979242f3bc-128375601) which launches today with a funding goal of $20,000 USD, features limited Early Bird specials of $25 USD, as well as several other perks for backers.  For those who do not have a pet to help them relax, Belly-Rub Pups are a tongue-in-cheek alternative.  A playful approach to a serious topic - stress - Belly-Rub Pups are designed to integrate proven stress management techniques, and offer users an introduction to mindfulness by letting them focus on belly-rubbing and taking their minds off of stressful thoughts.  Belly-Rub Pups, will turn stressful moments and personal fails into “belly-rub” moments, allowing users to relax, have a good laugh, and remember to keep a playful outlook on life.  Belly-Rub Pups are intuitive and do not require any lengthy training before positive effects can be felt.  Adorable and irresistible with their witty and friendly expression, Belly-Rub Pups add a little lightness to users’ lives and help make them laugh more often, which has been scientifically proven to reduce tension, lower stress and induce positive physical changes in the body.  Each of the four Belly-Rub Pups has a very unique character:  * FRANKIE - the centered soul-man who is calm in the storm, knows that in order to be stress-free, you have to look after your inner-self. * CHICA LOCA - the exercise freak who is insanely passionate about what she loves, gets easily hyped and is always ready for action. * NORMAN - the brain who is not only the cutest, but also the smartest friend, is not averse to snuggling while attempting to solve for X, Y, or stress. * ROMEO - the charmer and a sensitive dreamer, he knows that nothing makes you happier and more relaxed than feeling loved.   “Belly-Rub Pups add a little lightness to our lives and make us laugh more often,” said Beat Wyss, CEO, Awarenics. “Turning to a Belly-Rub Pup during stressful moments may just be the most enjoyable method of dealing with stress!”  Belly-Rub Pups are made from polyester and acrylic fibers, and each comes with an individually designed, high-wear microfiber bag, making it easy to carry them safely everywhere.  Users will be able to share their own ‘belly-rub moments’ on social media, using the hashtags #bellyrubmoments and #bellyrubtime.  Press Kit: HERE (https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1O6YGMXdyESEgPETiDDXYZxKFQKfag6mx?usp=sharing&utm_source=BRP+PRESS+LIST&utm_campaign=979242f3bc-EMAIL_CAMPAIGN_2019_08_14_08_21&utm_medium=email&utm_term=0_b73c00082d-979242f3bc-128375601)  About Awarenics: Awarenics, LLC was founded in 2017 with the vision of helping start-up companies achieve sustainable growth through early market testing, as well as the development of lifestyle products that consumers can emotionally relate to.  The company’s first products are Belly-Rub Pups, which were designed to bring a bit of fun and relaxation into people’s busy lives. Through these fun, loveable plushies, Awarenics hopes to bring as much joy to others as they have by creating them.  ###  Media Contact Info:  Glenn Mandel The LaunchPad Agency  760-798-1563 glenn@launchpadagency.com www.launchpadagency.com (http://www.launchpadagency.com/?utm_source=BRP+PRESS+LIST&utm_campaign=979242f3bc-EMAIL_CAMPAIGN_2019_08_14_08_21&utm_medium=email&utm_term=0_b73c00082d-979242f3bc-128375601) __________________________  ============================================================ ** Facebook (http://www.facebook.com/launchpadagency?utm_source=BRP+PRESS+LIST&utm_campaign=979242f3bc-EMAIL_CAMPAIGN_2019_08_14_08_21&utm_medium=email&utm_term=0_b73c00082d-979242f3bc-128375601) ** Website (www.launchpadagency.com) ** LinkedIn (https://www.linkedin.com/company/the-launchpad-agency/?utm_source=BRP+PRESS+LIST&utm_campaign=979242f3bc-EMAIL_CAMPAIGN_2019_08_14_08_21&utm_medium=email&utm_term=0_b73c00082d-979242f3bc-128375601) Copyright © 2019 The LaunchPad Agency, All rights reserved. column2: Pro-life movie UNPLANNED releases Down Under
column3: View this email in your browser (https://mailchi.mp/carmelcommunications/pro-life-movie-unplanned-releases-down-under-1191925?e=2dabec9bc3)   **  Pro-life movie UNPLANNED releases Down Under ------------------------------------------------------------   ** True story of former Planned Parenthood clinic director Abby Johnson heads to Australia and New Zealand this fall ------------------------------------------------------------   FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE  For More Information: Kevin Wandra, 404-788-1276 or KWandra@CarmelCommunications.com or Alexis Walkenstein, 561-445-5409 or Walkensteina@gmail.com (mailto:Walkensteina@gmail.com) LOS ANGELES, August 16, 2019 – The controversial pro-life movie UNPLANNED  is making its way around the world. Through a partnership with FanForce, UNPLANNED will be seen in over 100 theaters in Australia and New Zealand starting September 11. UNPLANNED is the true story of former Planned Parenthood clinic director Abby Johnson, which debuted in United States theaters on March 29.  “The last thing the abortion industry wants is truth,” said Bernie Finn, Member of Parliament, Western Region. “UNPLANNED is an uplifting story of one woman’s moment of truth from abortion champion to pro-life warrior. This movie is an invaluable contribution to a debate that is too often blurred by lies. Every Australian should see it.”  To find out where UNPLANNED is showing in Australia and New Zealand or to bring it to a community not listed, visit https://fan-force.com/films/unplanned.  “We continue to be utterly amazed at the international frenzy around Abby’s story,” said Cary Solomon and Chuck Konzelman, co-directors of UNPLANNED. “This proves to us that the world has a hunger to know the truth — to see what Abby saw — and to use this true story to show people everywhere the reality of abortion. No one in the world will be able to say they didn’t know.”  “We are so grateful to the people of Australia who welcomed us with open arms and found a way to bring this powerful story to their country,” said Daryl Lefever, producer of UNPLANNED. “I had the opportunity to visit Australia and it’s incredible to see this story embraced by other countries — we know that the world is suffering under the weight of a permeating pro-death culture and Abby’s story is the antidote.”  UNPLANNED is the dramatic account of a former Planned Parenthood superstar, Abby Johnson. In eight years, she rose from college volunteer, to one of the youngest clinic directors, to Employee of the Year … then she assisted with an abortion. The inspiring film traces Johnson’s journey from staunch abortion advocate to standing side-by-side with the people who prayed for her spiritual transformation and facing the full, head-on attack of one of the most powerful organizations on Earth. For more information, or to schedule an interview, please contact Kevin Wandra (404-788-1276 or Kwandra@carmelcommunications.com (mailto:Kwandra@carmelcommunications.com) ) or Alexis Walkenstein (561-445-5409 or Walkensteina@gmail.com (mailto:Walkensteina@gmail.com) ).  ###  ============================================================ Copyright © 2019 Carmel Communications. column2: Review Copy? Action-Packed Novel from NYT Bestselling Author Helps Kids Discover Their Superpowers
column3: Good morning, Stephanie,  Just in time for your fall book round-ups and to-read lists, I’m thrilled to share an adventure-packed new release from Harper Collins/Tommy Nelson with you: The Hadley Academy for the Improbably Gifted (https://www.amazon.com/Hadley-Academy-Improbably-Gifted-Novel/dp/140021534X) [October 8, 2019] by New York Times bestselling author Conor Grennan. Perfect for middle-grade readers but appealing to anyone who enjoyed The Hunger Games, The Chronicles of Narnia, Divergent and more – this fantasy debut is sure to entertain.  About the book: Growing up isn’t always easy… and most of us aren’t tasked with saving the world. Jack Carlson is dreading a class presentation when he suddenly finds himself transported to the Hadley Academy, a secret institution that tracks teens with unlikely gifts and trains them to protect the world from a secret squad of killers. But Jack isn't the only one who doesn't know what he's doing at Hadley. Despite indications that he is the one prophesied to end the ancient Reaper War, Jack appears to have no extraordinary abilities. When dark, mysterious forces grow, humanity seems to depend on Jack and his new teammates. Can Hadley's rawest recruits push past personal struggles and enormous doubts, develop their dormant powers, and stop the spreading evil?  Grennan’s novel doesn’t only captivate readers with a riveting plot, relatable characters, and humorous dialogue; the diverse cast of characters will appeal to a wide audience, including those who sometimes wonder what their own gifts might be.  I would love to send you one of the first advance copies of The Hadley Academy for the Improbably Gifted, if you’re interested in reviewing. Look forward to hearing your thoughts!  Thanks,  Jennifer Tucker  Smith Publicity  856.489.8654 ext. 303 | jennifer@smithpublicity.com (mailto:jennifer@smithpublicity.com)  CONOR GRENNAN is the author of the New York Times bestselling and #1 international bestselling memoir, Little Princes: One Man's Promise to Bring Home the Lost Children of Nepal. The memoir shares Grennan’s humanitarian work as the founder of Next Generation Nepal (NGN), a nonprofit organization dedicated to reconnecting trafficked children with their families in Nepal. Little Princes has been shortlisted for the Dayton Literary Peace Prize, was the winner of the Goodreads 2011 Best Travel and Outdoors Award, and has been translated into 15 languages. Following publication, Grennan spoke about the book across North America and particularly enjoyed sharing his story with young people at secondary schools and colleges.  For his work with the trafficked children of Nepal, Grennan was recognized by The Huffington Post as a 2011 Game Changer of the Year. In 2014, he was also named a recipient of the Unsung Heroes of Compassion, which was awarded to him by the Dalai Lama. Grennan is the Dean of MBA Students at the NYU Stern School of Business. He currently resides in New Canaan, Connecticut with his wife, Liz, and his two children, Finn and Lucy.  The Hadley Academy for the Improbably Gifted is Grennan’s debut work of fiction, and will be available everywhere books are sold on October 8, 2019.  Find Conor Grennan on Instagram (http://www.instagram.com/conorgrennan1) , Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/cgrennan) , Twitter (https://twitter.com/conorgrennan) , YouTube (https://www.youtube.com/c/conorgrennan) , and at www.conorgrennan.com (http://www.conorgrennan.com/) .  ______________________ If you would rather not receive future communications from Smith PublicityInc., please go to http://tcismith.pr-optout.com/OptOut.aspx?519228x41300x218429x1x5080076x24000x6&Email=customerservice%40csmonitor.com. Smith PublicityInc., 1930 E. Marlton Pike Ste I-46, Cherry Hill, NJ 08003 United States  --  To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to customerservice+unsubscribe@csps.com.

column2: Amtrak News Release: Amtrak Offers 50% Off National Travel with September Sale
column3: The following release, also attached, is issued by Amtrak Media Relations. It is also posted on the Amtrak Media Center<https://media.amtrak.com/2019/08/amtrak-offers-50-off-national-travel-with-september-sale/> at media.Amtrak.com<http://www.media.amtrak.com/>. --  Amtrak Offers 50% Off National Travel with September Sale    WASHINGTON - Amtrak is making it even easier to see America this fall with its September Sale<https://www.amtrak.com/septembersale>, offering customers 50% off ticket purchases nationwide. Starting Friday, Aug. 16, through Saturday, Aug. 17, customers can kick off Labor Day weekend with half-off tickets for nationwide travel between Sept. 1 and Sept. 30, 2019, with no blackout dates.    Amtrak wants to inspire customers to get carried away on an adventure to destinations across the country. With experiences and memories that can be kept for a lifetime, Amtrak invites customers to share the experience with friends, families and loved ones for a trip this September. With the September 50% off sale, customers can travel one-way for as low as: East Coast To/From Price Boston - Washington DC (Acela) $89 Boston - Philadelphia (NER) $52 Boston - Philadelphia (Acela) $79 Philadelphia - New Haven (NER) $33 Philadelphia - New Haven (Acela) $59 Washington DC - Boston (NER) $57 Washington DC - Boston (Acela) $89 Boston - Newark (NER) $39 Boston - Newark (Acela) $59 New York - Washington DC (NER) $39 New York - Washington DC (Acela) $87 Washington DC - Philadelphia (NER) $29 Washington DC - Philadelphia (Acela) $64 New York - Boston (NER) $42 New York - Boston (Acela) $59 Boston - Stamford (NER) $36 Boston - Stamford (Acela) $59 New York - Philadelphia (NER) $29 New York - Philadelphia (Acela) $57    Being able to easily travel from/to city centers, Amtrak offers the freedom to use phones and electronic devices at all times (no "airplane mode"), the ability to travel with small pets on many trains, large spacious seats with ample leg room, no middle seat, and one of the most generous baggage policies in the travel industry, applicable for two personal items and two carry-on bags.   The sale is available at Amtrak.com, and all prices will be automatically discounted from the standard fare price. This offer is not valid on unreserved service, including the Pennsylvanian, Keystone Service, Capitol Corridor, Hiawatha Service, Pacific Surfliner and 7000-8999 Thruways. Fares are one way (adult) and no additional discounts apply. This offer is valid for coach and Acela Business class seats only; no upgrades allowed. This offer if not combinable with any other discount offer. Once purchased tickets are non-refundable. Exchanges are permitted within the ticket validity period; a 25 percent cancellation fee applies.    About Amtrak(r)  Amtrak offers a more comfortable and convenient travel experience with free Wi-Fi on most trains, plenty of leg room and no middle seat. With our state and commuter partners, we move people, the economy and the nation forward, carrying more than 30 million Amtrak customers for each of the past seven years. Amtrak operates more than 300 trains daily, connecting more than 500 destinations in 46 states, the District of Columbia and three Canadian Provinces, and reaches 400 additional destinations via connecting bus routes. Book travel, check train status, access your eTicket and more through an Amtrak app.<https://www.amtrak.com/get-mobile-application-and-access> Learn more at Amtrak.com<http://www.amtrak.com/>.   ###

column2: I am moving to Scotland!
column3: Guess what theology nerds?  This is a special announcement.  I have just accepted a position as Postdoctoral Fellow at the **University of Edinburgh ( https://sable.madmimi.com/c/13477?id=2557286.6991.1.b65d7522afe48f1eb7b35a7fd337dbaf )**. There I will be part of a John Templeton Foundation ( https://sable.madmimi.com/c/13477?id=2557286.6992.1.e47143d87ad29e0230916191d1f034eb ) project, _God and the Book of Nature: Building a Science-Engaged Theology of Nature ( https://sable.madmimi.com/c/13477?id=2557286.6993.1.810788dd5fdd80f3cbcf73e818cdacd8 )._ It is hard to exaggerate how excited I am about this position and the opportunity to work in theological education. On top of that I will be able to interact and connect with a host of new voices for the podcast, across the pond.  **It really is a dream come true for this theology nerd.**  **Here's where I would absolutely love your help.**  Taking an entry level academic position at a prestigious university will open doors in the long run, so we want to take the venture as a family. The transition over seas will have a pretty significant hit in our monthly income, but being frugal isn't the biggest concern, it is the rather daunting costs of moving over seas. That's why we setup a GoFundMe where you can make a tax-deductible donation to the process.  For over 11 years Homebrewed Christianity has been bringing you online theological resources. With 70k regular listeners and having crossed over 3 million downloads already this year, I know many of you enjoy it almost as much as I do. Your support not only makes the podcast possible, but has enabled me to continue to pursue my dream.  **I am asking for those who are able to help out. Here's two ways you can.**  **Donate to the GoFundMe ( https://sable.madmimi.com/c/13477?id=2557286.6994.1.f5085cc7028aabce6870f11630f435ee )** to help us cover the moving costs. This donation is tax-deductible because of our partnership with ReWilder ( https://sable.madmimi.com/c/13477?id=2557286.6995.1.2614bcd9499459eff5ea75e53ddd9b0a ).  **Join the Homebrewed Community ( https://sable.madmimi.com/c/13477?id=2557286.6996.1.28f9641c0931af3860d1479cf62733aa )** and support the podcast with a monthly donation. You will also get access to a bunch of goodies including a year-long introduction to contemporary theology.  If you're strapped for funds, don't worry about it. Please, keep enjoying the podcast! But if you're able to help out, either one-time via GoFundMe ( https://sable.madmimi.com/c/13477?id=2557286.6997.1.cf2be3a58b2157a60331ece0dd47753b ) or recurring via the Homebrewed Community ( https://sable.madmimi.com/c/13477?id=2557286.6998.1.f849525fbf8a87423785bcf305f84c05 ), it would mean alot to me.  Either way, I look forward to bringing you all-new zestiness from across the pond.  **Thanks for considering,**  **Tripp**  Web Version https://sable.madmimi.com/c/13477?id=2557286.7001-768.1.250ee1a5a68e04516268c1d2891dc207&p=eyIlN0IlN0JtaW1pLXNpZ25hdHVyZSU3RCU3RCI6IjE1MzE2ODE3MC05NTQwODk4NTA2LTRjNzhhNmJkYzhiMDAzOGQwNDk3YTg4MWI1ODc5MzI2NWI2MDBmNWEiLCIlN0IlN0JlbWFpbElkJTdEJTdEIjoiMjU1NzI4NiJ9  Unsubscribe https://go.madmimi.com/opt_out?pact=2557286-153168170-9540898506-4c78a6bdc8b0038d0497a881b58793265b600f5a&amx=9540898506  Preferences https://sable.madmimi.com/c/13477?id=2557286.7002-769.1.a82ab0ccdc15878426b9fe433ecc6c78&p=eyIlN0IlN0JtaW1pLXNpZ25hdHVyZSU3RCU3RCI6IjE1MzE2ODE3MC05NTQwODk4NTA2LTRjNzhhNmJkYzhiMDAzOGQwNDk3YTg4MWI1ODc5MzI2NWI2MDBmNWEiLCIlN0IlN0JtZW1iZXItaWQlN0QlN0QiOjk1NDA4OTg1MDYsIiU3QiU3QmVtYWlsSWQlN0QlN0QiOiIyNTU3Mjg2In0=  Homebrewed Christianity | All rights reserved.

column2: About csmonitor.com.
column3: Hi *csmonitor.com <http://csmonitor.com> Team*  I noticed something interesting while going through your website, *csmonitor.com <http://csmonitor.com> * It's apparent that you have used Adwords marketing to promote your business in the past, however, your website does see some organic search traffic here and there. Now, I believe I can help increase that portion of organic traffic significantly, at *csmonitor.com <http://csmonitor.com> * I believe you would like to come top on searches for keywords related to *csmonitor.com <http://csmonitor.com>*... I found a number of SEO issues such as broken links, page speed issue, HTML validation errors, images with no ALT text on your website, that's stopping you from getting that traffic.  How about I fix those, and also promote you through engaging content on relevant places on the web (read, social media).  I guarantee you will see a drastic change in your search ranking and traffic once these issues are fixed. Also, this is one time, so no paying Adwords every month.  Is this something you are interested in?  If yes, please allow me to send you a *no-obligation audit report* and *quote*.  Hoping to hear from you and take this partnership ahead.  Best Regards, *Linda Mcsay*  *SEO-Consultant*  ……………………………………………………………………………………………………………….. column2: Re: Expert Avail in Boston- How Students Can Advocate for Themselves
column3: Hi Stephanie,  Following up on my previous note. Can we schedule an interview?  Thanks in advance for considering,  Joelle  Back to school might mean back to bullying, and other challenges for students of all ages.  Heather Hansen (https://heatherhansenpresents.com/) , partner at O’Brien and Ryan law firm, anchor at the Law and Crime network, host of The Elegant Warrior podcast and author of The Elegant Warrior: How to Win Life’s Trials Without Losing Yourself [Page Two, April 2019], is available for interviews to teach students how to advocate for themselves. She can address two audiences in particular:  1. Parents of young children who are going to school and need to learn to advocate for themselves with other students and teachers  2.  College students who need to advocate for themselves and stay safe.   Hansen’s advice for young children and parents of young children:  As your children head out for the new school year, they will face new challenges. They will need to learn to advocate for themselves effectively. You can help by teaching them the 4 Ps.   Pause—they don’t have to react right away. Most of the time if they are facing a bully or a “mean” teacher, there’s time to walk away and address it later.   Plan-then they can come home and plan for their advocacy. This is where questions come in. How could they handle the problem? What do they want to say? How do they want to say it?   Practice—playing it out with your children is a great way to make sure they are not only ready, but comfortable. I’d never step into trial without practicing, and your kids shouldn’t face their trials without practice either. (nor should adults!)  Play-when they get into the situation, all they have to do is “press play” on what they’ve prepped and practiced. They can go into the situation confident that they have the tools they need and that the conversation or interaction could even be fun!  This type of preparation also makes children much more likely to respond well when they don’t have time for the 4 Ps!  Hansen’s advice for college students:  As college students head out to their new lives without their parents, they will face new challenges. Some of those are hard, especially in the time of MeToo, frat hazing and social media bullying. Here are some ways they can advocate for themselves in tough situations, using the word DORM as guidance.   D-Discover. First, discover yourself. You can’t advocate for yourself until you know what you want and what you don’t want. Also this is the time to learn your limits with respect to drinking, relationships, and social media.   O-Object. You have to learn to object when you don’t like something. I was petrified the first time I objected in the courtroom. But no one can set your boundaries but you. When you know what you don’t want, it is time to use your voice and set those boundaries. Objections take practice so start small. Don’t be afraid to say “ I don’t like that”  R-Recognize tone and body language College kids need to know that bodies and voices can tell them as much as words do. Tone of voice is especially helpful, as studies show you can tell more about a person’s emotion from their tone of voice than their facial expressions. If they can read tone of voice, they may hear danger before they see it.   M-Move. When you feel uncomfortable, read a weird tone in a voice, don’t like someone’s body language, or don’t like the response to your objection, you can leave. Don’t be afraid to move your body. Sometimes confidence follows.   Are you interested in scheduling an interview or byline? I’m also happy to send a book your way.  More about Hansen is below.  Thanks in advance for your consideration and feedback.  Have a great day,  Joelle  HEATHER HANSEN is a trial lawyer, consultant and professional speaker. She has defended medical malpractice cases for over twenty years, was recently inducted into the American College of Trial Lawyers and is consistently named one of the Top 50 Female Attorneys in the state of Pennsylvania. Heather works as a communication consultant, combining her courtroom experience with her psychology degree and her training as a mediator to help her clients ask better questions, master objections, and use credible persuasion to succeed. She has appeared on CNN, NBC, Fox News Channel, and Good Day Philadelphia, and is the host of The Elegant Warrior podcast. Heather lives in New York City.  Connect with Heather Hansen on Facebook @HeatherHansenPresents (https://www.facebook.com/heatherhansenpresents/) , Twitter @ImHeatherHansen (https://twitter.com/imheatherhansen) , Instagram @ImHeatherHansen (https://www.instagram.com/imheatherhansen/?hl=en) , LinkedIn @HeatherHansen (https://www.linkedin.com/in/heather-hansen-84243512/) , YouTube (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2ecu4d4mKYZuh9QE9ZWhmA) , and visit www.heatherhansenpresent.com (http://www.heatherhansenpresent.com/) .  The Elegant Warrior: How to Win Life’s Trials Without Losing Yourself is available on Amazon (https://www.amazon.com/Elegant-Warrior-Trials-Without-Yourself/dp/1989025269)  and other fine booksellers.  You are receiving this email because your information is listed in the Vocus (https://www.cision.com/us/)  Media Database. By opting out through the link below, you will no longer receive emails about Heather Hansen. If you'd like to stop receiving ALL correspondence from Smith Publicity, please respond directly to this email with the word "REMOVE." column2: State Capture in the United Kingdom
column3: Dear Christian Science Monitor  I would like to draw your attention to the content on my website:  The articles below (along with the pages that they link to) will help introduce you to the subject matters of concern:  Planned Obsolescence in Social Care  https://sufficientproductions.com/the-bar-graph-planned-obsolescence-in-social-care  Citizen’s Questions https://sufficientproductions.com/citizens-questions  Missold! — Exposing the ‘Overarching Objective’ of MedicalPractice https://sufficientproductions.com/missold/   You are invited also, to read my e-book which is available for free download at www.sufficientproductions.com  The book is building up to Chapter 5 which speaks about Social Services, Safeguarding, and the Human Rights abuses. If you jump straight to Chapter 5, you lose the framing, and troublesome issues such as these need the framing.   Here's a link to a video that introduces my e-book. https://www.dropbox.com/s/2ufofaj6vem2u5q/Introducing%20Not-in-Service.mp4?dl=0  These are serious human rights abuses, but the Government and the Courts are turning a blind eye.  Please help publicise these issues.  Regards P.N.M  --  To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to customerservice+unsubscribe@csps.com.

column3: Good morning, I am sending the application as a friendly reminder that the funding application for the Mayors’ Charity Ball is due October 2, 2019. Have a wonderful day!  Terri Voss Administrative Assistant Permits & Codes Dardenne Prairie City Hall 636-755-5301 [cid:image001.png@01D550FF.26187FC0]  From: Terri Voss Sent: Wednesday, June 12, 2019 2:41 PM To: Connection Christian Church <bfakes@connectionchristian.org>; Apostles Lutheran church <pastorseth@apostles-lutheran.com>; 'Morning Star Church' <pastor.mike@mscwired.org>; 'Stonebridge Church' <sheri.ferris@stonebridgedp.org>; americancricketacademy@gmail.com; CrossHaven Church <jeremy@crosshavenchurch.com>; Dardenne Presbyterian Church <dpc@dpc4u.org>; 2 Rivers Church <info@2riverschurch.com>; Christian Science <info@ChristianScience.com>; 'Community Living' <crutherford@communitylivingmo.org>; ACAC Community Service <communityservice@acacstl.org> Subject: MCB 2020 Funding Application  Good afternoon, Attached to this email you will find the 2020 Mayors’ Charity Ball Funding Application. If your organization is a not-for-profit with approved IRS determination of tax exemption, your charities physical location is in St. Charles County and you have not received funding from us in the last three years….I have an opportunity for you! Do not hesitate to reach out to me for more information or if you know of a local organization in need of help, I would appreciate you sharing that with me.  Charity applications are due by Wednesday, October 2nd, 2019 by 5pm   Terri Voss Administrative Assistant Permits & Codes Dardenne Prairie City Hall 636-755-5301 [cid:BCB40D39-4849-4649-ADAE-98345B509E84]  From: Bess Bacher <bbacher@ofallon.mo.us<mailto:bbacher@ofallon.mo.us>> Sent: Friday, June 07, 2019 11:24 AM To: Jim Hennessey <jhennessey@cityofcottleville.com<mailto:jhennessey@cityofcottleville.com>>; Jim Hennessey <jim@wirecraftco.com<mailto:jim@wirecraftco.com>>; David Zucker <mayorzucker@dardenneprairie.org<mailto:mayorzucker@dardenneprairie.org>>; Kathy Schweikert <kathyschweikert@yahoo.com<mailto:kathyschweikert@yahoo.com>>; Kathy Schweikert <kschweikert@lakesaintlouis.com<mailto:kschweikert@lakesaintlouis.com>>; Richard West <caninekopz@msn.com<mailto:caninekopz@msn.com>>; Bill Hennessy <BHennessy@ofallon.mo.us<mailto:BHennessy@ofallon.mo.us>>; Dan Borgmeyer <dan.borgmeyer@stcharlescitymo.gov<mailto:dan.borgmeyer@stcharlescitymo.gov>>; Len Pagano <lpagano@stpetersmo.net<mailto:lpagano@stpetersmo.net>>; Nick Guccione <Nick.Guccione@wentzvillemo.org<mailto:Nick.Guccione@wentzvillemo.org>>; Nick Guccione <Nick.Guccione@wentzvillemo.org<mailto:Nick.Guccione@wentzvillemo.org>>; Willie Richter <willie@richterfarms.com<mailto:willie@richterfarms.com>>; Jim Rau <prau123@sbcglobal.net<mailto:prau123@sbcglobal.net>>; Julie Smith <jsmith@stpetersmo.net<mailto:jsmith@stpetersmo.net>>; Michele Mooney <michele.mooney@stcharlescitymo.gov<mailto:michele.mooney@stcharlescitymo.gov>>; Terri Voss <terriv@dardenneprairie.org<mailto:terriv@dardenneprairie.org>>; Angela Conner <Angela.Conner@wentzvillemo.org<mailto:Angela.Conner@wentzvillemo.org>> Subject: MCB 2020 Funding Application  Hello,  Attached is the funding application for the 2020 Mayors’ Charity Ball.  Each city is responsible to distribute the application to the charities within their community.  Michele – could you please post a message on the Facebook page to inform people the application is available.  All applications are due by Wednesday, October 2nd, 2019 by 5:00 p.m.  Reminders:  • The charity applications are due by Wednesday, October 2nd, 2019 by 5:00 p.m.  • I will email the committee members a copy of each submitted charity application on Monday, October 7th.  •Each Mayor is asked to select their top 5 favorite charities to interview, please submit your top 5 choices to me by Monday, October 14th.  It is important I receive the requested information by the deadline date.  Please either email me directly at bbacher@ofallon.mo.us<mailto:bbacher@ofallon.mo.us> or call 636.379.5535 with your top 5 choices. Once I tally the results, I will contact the top 7 to 12 charities by Wednesday, October 16th to set up interview time slots for Monday, October 28th.  The total amount of charities to be interviewed will depend on the exact number of votes received.  Thank you for your cooperation.  Have a great weekend.  Bess Bacher Mayor’s Administrative Assistant/ Deputy City Clerk  City of O’Fallon, Missouri 100 North Main Street O’Fallon, Missouri  63366 Office: 636.379.5535 Fax: 636.379.5617 Email: bbacher@ofallon.mo.us<mailto:bbacher@ofallon.mo.us>  www.ofallon.mo.us<http://www.ofallon.mo.us/>  ________________________________
